1006  const Vector<Number> &x,
1007  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
1008  &x_index_global_to_local_map) const;

2158  const unsigned int fixed_rank = 0);

2171  _invert_by_gauss_elim(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M_inv,

2203  RkMatrix<Number> *rkmatrix;

2209  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *fullmatrix;

2214  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type bc_node;
2215 
2222  std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *row_indices;
2223 
2231  std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *col_indices;
2232 
2243  std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> row_index_global_to_local_map;
2244 
2256  std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> col_index_global_to_local_map;
2257 
2261  size_type m;
2262 
2266  size_type n;
2267 
2272  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> Tind;
2273 
2278  std::vector<
2279  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>>
2280  Sigma_P;
2281 
2286  std::vector<RkMatrix<Number> *> Sigma_R;
2287 
2292  std::vector<LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *> Sigma_F;
2293 };

2295 
2304 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2305 void
2306 InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(
2307  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & hmat,
2308  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node)
2309 {
2313  hmat.bc_node =
2314  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2315  bc_node);
2316 
2321  hmat.row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2322  &(hmat.bc_node->get_data_reference()
2323  .get_tau_node()
2324  ->get_data_reference()
2325  .get_index_set()));
2326  hmat.col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2327  &(hmat.bc_node->get_data_reference()
2328  .get_sigma_node()
2329  ->get_data_reference()
2330  .get_index_set()));
2331 
2335  hmat.m = hmat.row_indices->size();
2336  hmat.n = hmat.col_indices->size();
2337 
2338  hmat.Sigma_P.clear();
2339  hmat.Sigma_R.clear();
2340  hmat.Sigma_F.clear();
2341 }
2342 
2343 
2353 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2354 void
2355 InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(
2356  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & hmat,
2357  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
2358  const std::vector<std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *,
2359  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>> & Sigma_P)
2360 {
2364  hmat.bc_node =
2365  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2366  bc_node);
2367 
2372  hmat.row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2373  &(hmat.bc_node->get_data_reference()
2374  .get_tau_node()
2375  ->get_data_reference()
2376  .get_index_set()));
2377  hmat.col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2378  &(hmat.bc_node->get_data_reference()
2379  .get_sigma_node()
2380  ->get_data_reference()
2381  .get_index_set()));
2382 
2386  hmat.m = hmat.row_indices->size();
2387  hmat.n = hmat.col_indices->size();
2388 
2389  for (std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
2390  &hmat_pair : Sigma_P)
2391  {
2392  hmat.Sigma_P.push_back(hmat_pair);
2393  }
2394 
2395  hmat.Sigma_R.clear();
2396  hmat.Sigma_F.clear();
2397 }
2398 
2399 
2409 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2410 void
2411 InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(
2412  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & hmat,
2413  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
2414  const std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
2415  &hmat_pair)
2416 {
2420  hmat.bc_node =
2421  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2422  bc_node);
2423 
2428  hmat.row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2429  &(hmat.bc_node->get_data_reference()
2430  .get_tau_node()
2431  ->get_data_reference()
2432  .get_index_set()));
2433  hmat.col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2434  &(hmat.bc_node->get_data_reference()
2435  .get_sigma_node()
2436  ->get_data_reference()
2437  .get_index_set()));
2438 
2442  hmat.m = hmat.row_indices->size();
2443  hmat.n = hmat.col_indices->size();
2444 
2445  hmat.Sigma_P.push_back(hmat_pair);
2446  hmat.Sigma_R.clear();
2447  hmat.Sigma_F.clear();
2448 }
2449 
2450 
2461 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2462 void
2463 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildrenWithoutAlloc(
2464  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
2465  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
2466  const bool is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map = true)
2467 {
2471  hmat->bc_node =
2472  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2473  bc_node);
2474 
2479  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2480  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2481  .get_tau_node()
2482  ->get_data_reference()
2483  .get_index_set()));
2484  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2485  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2486  .get_sigma_node()
2487  ->get_data_reference()
2488  .get_index_set()));
2489 
2493  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
2494  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
2495 
2496  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
2497  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
2498  {
2503  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
2504 
2508  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
2509  {
2513  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
2514  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
2515 
2516  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildrenWithoutAlloc(
2517  child_hmat,
2518  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
2519  is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map);
2520 
2524  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
2525 
2530  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
2531 
2532  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
2533  }
2534  }
2535  else
2536  {
2537  if (is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map)
2538  {
2543  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2544  *(hmat->row_indices), hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map);
2545  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2546  *(hmat->col_indices), hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
2547  }
2548 
2558  if (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
2559  {
2560  hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
2561  hmat->fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>();
2562  }
2563  else
2564  {
2565  hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
2566  hmat->rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>();
2567  }
2568  }
2569 }
2570 
2571 
2585 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2586 void
2587 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(
2588  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
2589  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
2590  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k,
2591  bool is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map = true)
2592 {
2596  hmat->bc_node =
2597  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2598  bc_node);
2599 
2604  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2605  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2606  .get_tau_node()
2607  ->get_data_reference()
2608  .get_index_set()));
2609  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2610  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2611  .get_sigma_node()
2612  ->get_data_reference()
2613  .get_index_set()));
2614 
2618  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
2619  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
2620 
2621  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
2622  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
2623  {
2628  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
2629 
2633  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
2634  {
2638  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
2639  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
2640 
2641  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(child_hmat,
2642  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
2643  fixed_rank_k,
2644  is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map);
2645 
2649  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
2650 
2655  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
2656 
2657  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
2658  }
2659  }
2660  else
2661  {
2662  if (is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map)
2663  {
2668  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2669  *(hmat->row_indices), hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map);
2670  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2671  *(hmat->col_indices), hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
2672  }
2673 
2683  if (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
2684  {
2685  hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
2686  hmat->fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(hmat->m, hmat->n);
2687  }
2688  else
2689  {
2690  hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
2691 
2692  if (fixed_rank_k == 0)
2693  {
2694  // When the given rank is zero, an empty rank-k matrix is created,
2695  // whose memory is left for further allocation.
2696  hmat->rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>();
2697  }
2698  else
2699  {
2700  hmat->rkmatrix =
2701  new RkMatrix<Number>(hmat->m, hmat->n, fixed_rank_k);
2702  }
2703  }
2704  }
2705 }
2706 
2707 
2729 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2730 void
2731 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(
2732  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
2733  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
2734  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k,
2735  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M,
2736  bool is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map = true)
2737 {
2741  hmat->bc_node =
2742  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2743  bc_node);
2744 
2748  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2749  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2750  .get_tau_node()
2751  ->get_data_reference()
2752  .get_index_set()));
2753  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2754  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2755  .get_sigma_node()
2756  ->get_data_reference()
2757  .get_index_set()));
2758 
2762  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
2763  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
2764 
2765  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
2766 
2767  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
2768  {
2774  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
2775 
2776  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
2777  {
2781  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
2782  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
2783 
2784  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(child_hmat,
2785  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
2786  fixed_rank_k,
2787  M,
2788  is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map);
2789 
2793  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
2794 
2799  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
2800 
2801  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
2802  }
2803  }
2804  else
2805  {
2806  if (is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map)
2807  {
2812  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2813  *(hmat->row_indices), hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map);
2814  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2815  *(hmat->col_indices), hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
2816  }
2817 
2827  if (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
2828  {
2829  hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
2830  hmat->fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(hmat->m, hmat->n);
2831 
2835  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < hmat->m; i++)
2836  {
2837  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < hmat->n; j++)
2838  {
2839  (*hmat->fullmatrix)(i, j) =
2840  M(hmat->row_indices->at(i), hmat->col_indices->at(j));
2841  }
2842  }
2843  }
2844  else
2845  {
2846  hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
2847  hmat->rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(*(hmat->row_indices),
2848  *(hmat->col_indices),
2849  fixed_rank_k,
2850  M);
2851  }
2852  }
2853 }
2854 
2855 
2877 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2878 void
2879 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(
2880  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
2881  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
2882  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M,
2883  bool is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map = true)
2884 {
2888  hmat->bc_node =
2889  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2890  bc_node);
2891 
2895  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2896  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2897  .get_tau_node()
2898  ->get_data_reference()
2899  .get_index_set()));
2900  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2901  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2902  .get_sigma_node()
2903  ->get_data_reference()
2904  .get_index_set()));
2905 
2909  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
2910  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
2911 
2912  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
2913 
2914  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
2915  {
2921  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
2922 
2923  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
2924  {
2928  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
2929  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
2930 
2931  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(child_hmat,
2932  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
2933  M,
2934  is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map);
2935 
2939  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
2940 
2945  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
2946 
2947  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
2948  }
2949  }
2950  else
2951  {
2952  if (is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map)
2953  {
2958  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2959  *(hmat->row_indices), hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map);
2960  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2961  *(hmat->col_indices), hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
2962  }
2963 
2973  if (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
2974  {
2975  hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
2976  hmat->fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(hmat->m, hmat->n);
2977 
2981  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < hmat->m; i++)
2982  {
2983  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < hmat->n; j++)
2984  {
2985  (*hmat->fullmatrix)(i, j) =
2986  M(hmat->row_indices->at(i), hmat->col_indices->at(j));
2987  }
2988  }
2989  }
2990  else
2991  {
2992  hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
2993  hmat->rkmatrix =
2994  new RkMatrix<Number>(*(hmat->row_indices), *(hmat->col_indices), M);
2995  }
2996  }
2997 }
2998 
2999 
3028 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
3029 void
3030 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(
3031  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
3032  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
3033  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k,
3034  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M,
3035  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
3036  &row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3037  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
3038  & col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3039  bool is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map = true)
3040 {
3044  hmat->bc_node =
3045  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
3046  bc_node);
3047 
3051  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3052  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3053  .get_tau_node()
3054  ->get_data_reference()
3055  .get_index_set()));
3056  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3057  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3058  .get_sigma_node()
3059  ->get_data_reference()
3060  .get_index_set()));
3061 
3065  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
3066  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
3067 
3068  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
3069 
3070  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
3071  {
3077  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
3078 
3079  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
3080  {
3084  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
3085  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
3086 
3087  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(child_hmat,
3088  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
3089  fixed_rank_k,
3090  M,
3091  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3092  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3093  is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map);
3094 
3098  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
3099 
3104  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
3105 
3106  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
3107  }
3108  }
3109  else
3110  {
3111  if (is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map)
3112  {
3117  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3118  *(hmat->row_indices), hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map);
3119  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3120  *(hmat->col_indices), hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3121  }
3122 
3132  if (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
3133  {
3134  hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
3135  hmat->fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(hmat->m, hmat->n);
3136 
3140  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < hmat->m; i++)
3141  {
3142  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < hmat->n; j++)
3143  {
3144  (*hmat->fullmatrix)(i, j) =
3145  M(row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M.at(
3146  hmat->row_indices->at(i)),
3147  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M.at(
3148  hmat->col_indices->at(j)));
3149  }
3150  }
3151  }
3152  else
3153  {
3154  hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
3155  hmat->rkmatrix =
3156  new RkMatrix<Number>(*(hmat->row_indices),
3157  *(hmat->col_indices),
3158  fixed_rank_k,
3159  M,
3160  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3161  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M);
3162  }
3163  }
3164 }
3165 
3166 
3195 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
3196 void
3197 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(
3198  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
3199  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
3200  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M,
3201  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
3202  &row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3203  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
3204  & col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3205  bool is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map = true)
3206 {
3210  hmat->bc_node =
3211  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
3212  bc_node);
3213 
3217  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3218  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3219  .get_tau_node()
3220  ->get_data_reference()
3221  .get_index_set()));
3222  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3223  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3224  .get_sigma_node()
3225  ->get_data_reference()
3226  .get_index_set()));
3227 
3231  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
3232  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
3233 
3234  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
3235 
3236  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
3237  {
3243  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
3244 
3245  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
3246  {
3250  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
3251  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
3252 
3253  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(child_hmat,
3254  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
3255  M,
3256  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3257  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3258  is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map);
3259 
3263  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
3264 
3269  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
3270 
3271  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
3272  }
3273  }
3274  else
3275  {
3276  if (is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map)
3277  {
3282  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3283  *(hmat->row_indices), hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map);
3284  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3285  *(hmat->col_indices), hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3286  }
3287 
3297  if (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
3298  {
3299  hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
3300  hmat->fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(hmat->m, hmat->n);
3301 
3305  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < hmat->m; i++)
3306  {
3307  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < hmat->n; j++)
3308  {
3309  (*hmat->fullmatrix)(i, j) =
3310  M(row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M.at(
3311  hmat->row_indices->at(i)),
3312  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M.at(
3313  hmat->col_indices->at(j)));
3314  }
3315  }
3316  }
3317  else
3318  {
3319  hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
3320  hmat->rkmatrix =
3321  new RkMatrix<Number>(*(hmat->row_indices),
3322  *(hmat->col_indices),
3323  M,
3324  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3325  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M);
3326  }
3327  }
3328 }
3329 
3330 
3342 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
3343 void
3344 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(
3345  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
3346  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
3347  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> && H)
3348 {
3352  hmat->bc_node =
3353  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
3354  bc_node);
3355 
3360  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3361  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3362  .get_tau_node()
3363  ->get_data_reference()
3364  .get_index_set()));
3365  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3366  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3367  .get_sigma_node()
3368  ->get_data_reference()
3369  .get_index_set()));
3370 
3374  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
3375  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
3376 
3377  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
3378 
3379  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
3380  {
3385  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
3386 
3390  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
3391  {
3395  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
3396  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
3397 
3398  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(child_hmat,
3399  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
3400  std::move(H));
3401 
3405  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
3406 
3411  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
3412 
3413  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
3414  }
3415  }
3416  else
3417  {
3422  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *matched_source_hmat = *(
3423  H.find_block_cluster_in_leaf_set(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()));
3428  (*hmat) = std::move(*matched_source_hmat);
3429  }
3430 }
3431 
3432 
3447 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
3448 void
3449 RefineHMatrixWrtExtendedBlockClusterTree(
3450  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *starting_hmat,
3451  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *current_hmat)
3452 {
3461  Assert((starting_hmat->type == FullMatrixType) ||
3462  (starting_hmat->type == RkMatrixType),
3463  ExcInvalidHMatrixType(starting_hmat->type));
3464 
3472  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = current_hmat->bc_node->get_child_num();
3473 
3474  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
3475  {
3486  if (current_hmat != starting_hmat)
3487  {
3488  current_hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
3489  }
3490 
3491  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
3492  {
3498  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
3499  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
3500 
3501  current_hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
3502 
3507  child_hmat->bc_node = const_cast<
3508  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
3509  current_hmat->bc_node->get_child_pointer(i));
3510 
3515  child_hmat->row_indices =
3516  const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3517  &(child_hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3518  .get_tau_node()
3519  ->get_data_reference()
3520  .get_index_set()));
3521  child_hmat->col_indices =
3522  const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3523  &(child_hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3524  .get_sigma_node()
3525  ->get_data_reference()
3526  .get_index_set()));
3527 
3532  child_hmat->m = child_hmat->row_indices->size();
3533  child_hmat->n = child_hmat->col_indices->size();
3534 
3539  child_hmat->parent = current_hmat;
3540 
3541  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
3542 
3546  RefineHMatrixWrtExtendedBlockClusterTree(starting_hmat, child_hmat);
3547  }
3548  }
3549  else
3550  {
3555  if (current_hmat == starting_hmat)
3556  {
3562  }
3563  else
3564  {
3576  if (current_hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
3577  {
3578  current_hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
3579 
3586  switch (starting_hmat->type)
3587  {
3588  case FullMatrixType:
3589  {
3590  current_hmat->fullmatrix =
3591  new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(
3592  *(current_hmat->row_indices),
3593  *(current_hmat->col_indices),
3594  *(starting_hmat->fullmatrix),
3595  starting_hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3596  starting_hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3597 
3598  break;
3599  }
3600  case RkMatrixType:
3601  {
3602  current_hmat->fullmatrix =
3603  new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>();
3604  starting_hmat->rkmatrix->restrictToFullMatrix(
3605  *(current_hmat->row_indices),
3606  *(current_hmat->col_indices),
3607  starting_hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3608  starting_hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map,
3609  *(current_hmat->fullmatrix));
3610 
3611  break;
3612  }
3613  default:
3614  {
3615  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(starting_hmat->type));
3616 
3617  break;
3618  }
3619  }
3620  }
3621  else
3622  {
3623  current_hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
3624 
3629  switch (starting_hmat->type)
3630  {
3631  case FullMatrixType:
3632  {
3633  current_hmat->rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
3634  *(current_hmat->row_indices),
3635  *(current_hmat->col_indices),
3636  *(starting_hmat->fullmatrix),
3637  starting_hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3638  starting_hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3639 
3640  break;
3641  }
3642  case RkMatrixType:
3643  {
3644  current_hmat->rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
3645  *(current_hmat->row_indices),
3646  *(current_hmat->col_indices),
3647  *(starting_hmat->rkmatrix),
3648  starting_hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3649  starting_hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3650 
3651  break;
3652  }
3653  default:
3654  {
3655  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(starting_hmat->type));
3656 
3657  break;
3658  }
3659  }
3660  }
3661  }
3662  }
3663 
3668 }
3669 
3670 
3722 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
3723 void
3724 convertHMatBlockToRkMatrix(
3725  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat_block,
3726  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k,
3727  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *hmat_root_block = nullptr,
3728  size_t * calling_counter = nullptr,
3729  const std::string &output_file_base_name = std::string("hmat-bct"))
3730 {
3736  using size_type = typename HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::size_type;
3737 
3738  Assert(hmat_block->type != UndefinedMatrixType,
3739  ExcInvalidHMatrixType(hmat_block->type));
3740 
3741  if (hmat_block->bc_node->is_leaf())
3742  {
3747  if (hmat_block->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
3748  {
3756  Assert(hmat_block->type == FullMatrixType,
3757  ExcInvalidHMatrixType(hmat_block->type));
3758  }
3759  else
3760  {
3767  Assert(hmat_block->type == RkMatrixType,
3768  ExcInvalidHMatrixType(hmat_block->type));
3769 
3770  hmat_block->rkmatrix->truncate_to_rank(fixed_rank_k);
3771  }
3772  }
3773  else
3774  {
3780  for (auto submatrix : hmat_block->submatrices)
3781  {
3782  convertHMatBlockToRkMatrix(submatrix,
3783  fixed_rank_k,
3784  hmat_root_block,
3785  calling_counter,
3786  output_file_base_name);
3787  }
3788 
3789  if (hmat_block->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
3790  {
3843  for (const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix :
3844  hmat_block->submatrices)
3845  {
3846  Assert(submatrix->type == FullMatrixType,
3847  ExcInvalidHMatrixType(submatrix->type));
3848  }
3849 
3854  if (hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
3855  {
3856  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3857  *(hmat_block->row_indices),
3858  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map);
3859  }
3860 
3865  if (hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
3866  {
3867  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3868  *(hmat_block->col_indices),
3869  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3870  }
3871 
3872  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *fullmatrix;
3873 
3874  switch (hmat_block->bc_node->get_split_mode())
3875  {
3876  case CrossSplitMode:
3877  {
3878  AssertDimension(hmat_block->submatrices.size(), 4);
3879 
3880  fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(
3881  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3882  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
3883  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->fullmatrix),
3884  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
3885  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
3886  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->fullmatrix),
3887  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
3888  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
3889  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->fullmatrix),
3890  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->row_indices),
3891  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->col_indices),
3892  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->fullmatrix),
3893  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->row_indices),
3894  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->col_indices));
3895 
3896  break;
3897  }
3898  case HorizontalSplitMode:
3899  {
3900  AssertDimension(hmat_block->submatrices.size(), 2);
3901 
3902  fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(
3903  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3904  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
3905  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->fullmatrix),
3906  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
3907  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
3908  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->fullmatrix),
3909  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
3910  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
3911  true);
3912 
3913  break;
3914  }
3915  case VerticalSplitMode:
3916  {
3917  AssertDimension(hmat_block->submatrices.size(), 2);
3918 
3919  fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(
3920  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3921  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
3922  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->fullmatrix),
3923  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
3924  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
3925  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->fullmatrix),
3926  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
3927  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
3928  false);
3929 
3930  break;
3931  }
3932  default:
3933  {
3934  Assert(
3935  false,
3936  ExcMessage(
3937  std::string("Invalid block cluster splitting mode: ") +
3938  std::to_string(hmat_block->bc_node->get_split_mode())));
3939  }
3940  }
3941 
3942  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : hmat_block->submatrices)
3943  {
3944  if (submatrix != nullptr)
3945  {
3946  delete submatrix;
3947  }
3948  }
3949  hmat_block->submatrices.clear();
3950 
3951  hmat_block->fullmatrix = fullmatrix;
3952  hmat_block->type = FullMatrixType;
3953  }
3954  else
3955  {
3962  RkMatrix<Number> *rkmatrix;
3963 
3968  if (hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
3969  {
3970  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3971  *(hmat_block->row_indices),
3972  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map);
3973  }
3974 
3979  if (hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
3980  {
3981  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3982  *(hmat_block->col_indices),
3983  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3984  }
3985 
3986  switch (hmat_block->bc_node->get_split_mode())
3987  {
3988  case CrossSplitMode:
3989  {
3990  AssertDimension(hmat_block->submatrices.size(), 4);
3991 
3992  if (hmat_block->submatrices[0]->type == RkMatrixType &&
3993  hmat_block->submatrices[1]->type == RkMatrixType &&
3994  hmat_block->submatrices[2]->type == RkMatrixType &&
3995  hmat_block->submatrices[3]->type == RkMatrixType)
3996  {
4002  rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
4003  fixed_rank_k,
4004  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
4005  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
4006  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->rkmatrix),
4007  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
4008  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
4009  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->rkmatrix),
4010  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
4011  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
4012  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->rkmatrix),
4013  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->row_indices),
4014  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->col_indices),
4015  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->rkmatrix),
4016  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->row_indices),
4017  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->col_indices));
4018  }
4019  else if (hmat_block->submatrices[0]->type == FullMatrixType &&
4020  hmat_block->submatrices[1]->type == FullMatrixType &&
4021  hmat_block->submatrices[2]->type == FullMatrixType &&
4022  hmat_block->submatrices[3]->type == FullMatrixType)
4023  {
4030  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix11(
4031  fixed_rank_k,
4032  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->fullmatrix));
4033  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix12(
4034  fixed_rank_k,
4035  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->fullmatrix));
4036  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix21(
4037  fixed_rank_k,
4038  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->fullmatrix));
4039  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix22(
4040  fixed_rank_k,
4041  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->fullmatrix));
4042 
4043  rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
4044  fixed_rank_k,
4045  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
4046  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
4047  rkmatrix11,
4048  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
4049  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
4050  rkmatrix12,
4051  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
4052  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
4053  rkmatrix21,
4054  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->row_indices),
4055  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->col_indices),
4056  rkmatrix22,
4057  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->row_indices),
4058  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->col_indices));
4059  }
4060  else
4061  {
4065  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
4066  }
4067 
4068  break;
4069  }
4070  case HorizontalSplitMode:
4071  {
4072  AssertDimension(hmat_block->submatrices.size(), 2);
4073 
4074  if (hmat_block->submatrices[0]->type == RkMatrixType &&
4075  hmat_block->submatrices[1]->type == RkMatrixType)
4076  {
4082  rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
4083  fixed_rank_k,
4084  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
4085  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
4086  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->rkmatrix),
4087  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
4088  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
4089  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->rkmatrix),
4090  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
4091  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
4092  true);
4093  }
4094  else if (hmat_block->submatrices[0]->type == FullMatrixType &&
4095  hmat_block->submatrices[1]->type == FullMatrixType)
4096  {
4103  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix1(
4104  fixed_rank_k,
4105  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->fullmatrix));
4106  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix2(
4107  fixed_rank_k,
4108  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->fullmatrix));
4109 
4110  rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
4111  fixed_rank_k,
4112  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
4113  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
4114  rkmatrix1,
4115  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
4116  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
4117  rkmatrix2,
4118  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
4119  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
4120  true);
4121  }
4122  else
4123  {
4127  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
4128  }
4129 
4130  break;
4131  }
4132  case VerticalSplitMode:
4133  {
4134  AssertDimension(hmat_block->submatrices.size(), 2);
4135 
4136  if (hmat_block->submatrices[0]->type == RkMatrixType &&
4137  hmat_block->submatrices[1]->type == RkMatrixType)
4138  {
4144  rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
4145  fixed_rank_k,
4146  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
4147  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
4148  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->rkmatrix),
4149  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
4150  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
4151  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->rkmatrix),
4152  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
4153  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
4154  false);
4155  }
4156  else if (hmat_block->submatrices[0]->type == FullMatrixType &&
4157  hmat_block->submatrices[1]->type == FullMatrixType)
4158  {
4165  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix1(
4166  fixed_rank_k,
4167  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->fullmatrix));
4168  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix2(
4169  fixed_rank_k,
4170  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->fullmatrix));
4171 
4172  rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
4173  fixed_rank_k,
4174  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
4175  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
4176  rkmatrix1,
4177  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
4178  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
4179  rkmatrix2,
4180  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
4181  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
4182  false);
4183  }
4184  else
4185  {
4189  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
4190  }
4191 
4192  break;
4193  }
4194  default:
4195  {
4196  Assert(
4197  false,
4198  ExcMessage(
4199  std::string("Invalid block cluster splitting mode: ") +
4200  std::to_string(hmat_block->bc_node->get_split_mode())));
4201  }
4202  }
4203 
4204  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : hmat_block->submatrices)
4205  {
4206  if (submatrix != nullptr)
4207  {
4208  delete submatrix;
4209  }
4210  }
4211  hmat_block->submatrices.clear();
4212 
4213  hmat_block->rkmatrix = rkmatrix;
4214  hmat_block->type = RkMatrixType;
4215  }
4216 
4222  if (hmat_root_block != nullptr && calling_counter != nullptr)
4223  {
4224  std::ofstream output_stream(
4225  output_file_base_name + std::to_string(*calling_counter) + ".dat");
4226  hmat_root_block->write_leaf_set(output_stream);
4227  output_stream.close();
4228 
4229  (*calling_counter) = (*calling_counter) + 1;
4230  }
4231  }
4236 }
4237 
4238 
4268 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4269 void
4270 h_rk_mmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
4271  const RkMatrix<Number> & M2,
4272  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4273 {
4274  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m);
4275 
4281  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_A(M2.A.m());
4282  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
4283 
4288  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.n, M2.formal_rank);
4289  M.B = M2.B;
4290 
4294  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4295  {
4296  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
4297  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4298  }
4299 
4300  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4301  {
4302  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
4303  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4304  }
4305 
4310  for (size_t j = 0; j < M2.formal_rank; j++)
4311  {
4312  M2.A.get_column(j, col_vect_in_A);
4313  result_vect = 0.;
4314  M1.vmult(result_vect,
4315  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
4316  col_vect_in_A,
4317  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4318 
4322  M.A.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4323  }
4324 }
4325 
4326 
4358 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4359 void
4360 h_rk_mmult(const Number alpha,
4361  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
4362  const RkMatrix<Number> & M2,
4363  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4364 {
4365  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m);
4366 
4372  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_A(M2.A.m());
4373  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
4374 
4379  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.n, M2.formal_rank);
4380  M.B = M2.B;
4381 
4385  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4386  {
4387  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
4388  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4389  }
4390 
4391  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4392  {
4393  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
4394  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4395  }
4396 
4401  for (size_t j = 0; j < M2.formal_rank; j++)
4402  {
4403  M2.A.get_column(j, col_vect_in_A);
4408  result_vect = 0.;
4409  M1.vmult(result_vect,
4410  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
4411  alpha,
4412  col_vect_in_A,
4413  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4414 
4418  M.A.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4419  }
4420 }
4421 
4422 
4453 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4454 void
4455 h_rk_mTmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
4456  const RkMatrix<Number> & M2,
4457  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4458 {
4459  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n);
4460 
4466  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_B(M2.B.m());
4467  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
4468 
4473  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.m, M2.formal_rank);
4474  M.B = M2.A;
4475 
4479  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4480  {
4481  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
4482  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4483  }
4484 
4485  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4486  {
4487  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
4488  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4489  }
4490 
4495  for (size_t j = 0; j < M2.formal_rank; j++)
4496  {
4497  M2.B.get_column(j, col_vect_in_B);
4498  result_vect = 0.;
4499  M1.vmult(result_vect,
4500  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
4501  col_vect_in_B,
4502  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4503 
4507  M.A.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4508  }
4509 }
4510 
4511 
4544 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4545 void
4546 h_rk_mTmult(const Number alpha,
4547  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
4548  const RkMatrix<Number> & M2,
4549  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4550 {
4551  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n);
4552 
4558  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_B(M2.B.m());
4559  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
4560 
4565  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.m, M2.formal_rank);
4566  M.B = M2.A;
4567 
4571  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4572  {
4573  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
4574  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4575  }
4576 
4577  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4578  {
4579  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
4580  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4581  }
4582 
4587  for (size_t j = 0; j < M2.formal_rank; j++)
4588  {
4589  M2.B.get_column(j, col_vect_in_B);
4590  result_vect = 0.;
4591  M1.vmult(result_vect,
4592  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
4593  alpha,
4594  col_vect_in_B,
4595  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4596 
4600  M.A.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4601  }
4602 }
4603 
4604 
4613 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4614 void
4615 h_rk_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M1,
4616  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M2,
4617  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M,
4618  bool is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P = true)
4619 {
4620  Assert(M2->type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M2->type));
4621  Assert(M2->rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
4622  // Assert(*(M1->col_indices) == *(M2->row_indices),
4623  // ExcMessage("Incompatible index sets during matrix
4624  // multiplication"));
4625  AssertDimension(M1->n, M2->m);
4626 
4627  // DEBUG
4628  // print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::cout, "M1", *M1, "M2", *M2);
4629 
4630  if (is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P)
4631  {
4632  M->Sigma_P.pop_back();
4633  }
4634  else
4635  {
4636  M->remove_hmat_pair_from_mm_product_list(M1, M2);
4637  }
4638 
4639  RkMatrix<Number> *M_rk = new RkMatrix<Number>();
4640  h_rk_mmult(*M1, *(M2->rkmatrix), *M_rk);
4641  M->Sigma_R.push_back(M_rk);
4642 
4643  // // DEBUG
4644  // LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M_rk_to_full;
4645  // M_rk->convertToFullMatrix(M_rk_to_full);
4646  // M_rk_to_full.print_formatted(std::cout, 8, false, 16, "0");
4647 
4648  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_F.size(), 0);
4649  M->type = RkMatrixType;
4650 }
4651 
4652 
4682 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4683 void
4684 rk_h_mmult(const RkMatrix<Number> & M1,
4685  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
4686  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4687 {
4688  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m);
4689 
4695  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_B(M1.B.m());
4696  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.n);
4697 
4702  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.n, M1.formal_rank);
4703  M.A = M1.A;
4704 
4708  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4709  {
4710  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
4711  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4712  }
4713 
4714  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4715  {
4716  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
4717  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4718  }
4719 
4724  for (size_t j = 0; j < M.formal_rank; j++)
4725  {
4726  M1.B.get_column(j, col_vect_in_B);
4727  result_vect = 0.;
4728  M2.Tvmult(result_vect,
4729  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map,
4730  col_vect_in_B,
4731  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4732 
4736  M.B.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4737  }
4738 }
4739 
4740 
4772 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4773 void
4774 rk_h_mmult(const Number alpha,
4775  const RkMatrix<Number> & M1,
4776  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
4777  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4778 {
4779  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m);
4780 
4786  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_B(M1.B.m());
4787  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.n);
4788 
4793  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.n, M1.formal_rank);
4794  M.A = M1.A;
4795 
4799  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4800  {
4801  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
4802  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4803  }
4804 
4805  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4806  {
4807  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
4808  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4809  }
4810 
4815  for (size_t j = 0; j < M.formal_rank; j++)
4816  {
4817  M1.B.get_column(j, col_vect_in_B);
4822  result_vect = 0.;
4823  M2.Tvmult(result_vect,
4824  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map,
4825  alpha,
4826  col_vect_in_B,
4827  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4828 
4832  M.B.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4833  }
4834 }
4835 
4836 
4865 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4866 void
4867 rk_h_mTmult(const RkMatrix<Number> & M1,
4868  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
4869  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4870 {
4871  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n);
4872 
4878  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_B(M1.B.m());
4879  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.m);
4880 
4885  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.m, M1.formal_rank);
4886  M.A = M1.A;
4887 
4891  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4892  {
4893  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
4894  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4895  }
4896 
4897  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4898  {
4899  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
4900  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4901  }
4902 
4907  for (size_t j = 0; j < M.formal_rank; j++)
4908  {
4909  M1.B.get_column(j, col_vect_in_B);
4910  result_vect = 0.;
4911  M2.vmult(result_vect,
4912  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map,
4913  col_vect_in_B,
4914  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4915 
4919  M.B.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4920  }
4921 }
4922 
4923 
4953 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4954 void
4955 rk_h_mTmult(const Number alpha,
4956  const RkMatrix<Number> & M1,
4957  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
4958  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4959 {
4960  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n);
4961 
4967  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_B(M1.B.m());
4968  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.m);
4969 
4974  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.m, M1.formal_rank);
4975  M.A = M1.A;
4976 
4980  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4981  {
4982  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
4983  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4984  }
4985 
4986  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4987  {
4988  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
4989  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4990  }
4991 
4996  for (size_t j = 0; j < M.formal_rank; j++)
4997  {
4998  M1.B.get_column(j, col_vect_in_B);
4999  result_vect = 0.;
5000  M2.vmult(result_vect,
5001  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5002  alpha,
5003  col_vect_in_B,
5004  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5005 
5009  M.B.fill_col(j, result_vect);
5010  }
5011 }
5012 
5013 
5022 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5023 void
5024 rk_h_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M1,
5025  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M2,
5026  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M,
5027  bool is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P = true)
5028 {
5029  Assert(M1->type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M1->type));
5030  Assert(M1->rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
5031  // Assert(*(M1->col_indices) == *(M2->row_indices),
5032  // ExcMessage("Incompatible index sets during matrix
5033  // multiplication"));
5034  AssertDimension(M1->n, M2->m);
5035 
5036  // // DEBUG
5037  // print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::cout, "M1", *M1, "M2", *M2);
5038 
5039  if (is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P)
5040  {
5041  M->Sigma_P.pop_back();
5042  }
5043  else
5044  {
5045  M->remove_hmat_pair_from_mm_product_list(M1, M2);
5046  }
5047 
5048  RkMatrix<Number> *M_rk = new RkMatrix<Number>();
5049  rk_h_mmult(*(M1->rkmatrix), *M2, *M_rk);
5050  M->Sigma_R.push_back(M_rk);
5051 
5052  // // DEBUG
5053  // LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M_rk_to_full;
5054  // M_rk->convertToFullMatrix(M_rk_to_full);
5055  // M_rk_to_full.print_formatted(std::cout, 8, false, 16, "0");
5056 
5057  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_F.size(), 0);
5058  M->type = RkMatrixType;
5059 }
5060 
5061 
5071 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5072 void
5073 h_f_mmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5074  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5075  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5076 {
5077  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m());
5078 
5079  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_M2(M2.m());
5080  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
5081 
5082  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m;
5083  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.n();
5084 
5088  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5089  {
5090  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
5091  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5092  }
5093 
5094  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5095  {
5096  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
5097  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5098  }
5099 
5100  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5101  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type j = 0; j < n_cols; j++)
5102  {
5103  M2.get_column(j, col_vect_in_M2);
5104  result_vect = 0.;
5105  M1.vmult(result_vect,
5106  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5107  col_vect_in_M2,
5108  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5109  M.fill_col(j, result_vect);
5110  }
5111 }
5112 
5113 
5125 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5126 void
5127 h_f_mmult(const Number alpha,
5128  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5129  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5130  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5131 {
5132  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m());
5133 
5134  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_M2(M2.m());
5135  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
5136 
5137  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m;
5138  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.n();
5139 
5143  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5144  {
5145  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
5146  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5147  }
5148 
5149  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5150  {
5151  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
5152  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5153  }
5154 
5155  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5156  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type j = 0; j < n_cols; j++)
5157  {
5158  M2.get_column(j, col_vect_in_M2);
5159  result_vect = 0.;
5160  M1.vmult(result_vect,
5161  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5162  alpha,
5163  col_vect_in_M2,
5164  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5165  M.fill_col(j, result_vect);
5166  }
5167 }
5168

5180 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5181 void
5182 h_f_mTmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5183  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5184  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5185 {
5186  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n());
5187 
5188  Vector<Number> row_vect_in_M2(M2.n());
5189  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
5190 
5191  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m;
5192  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.m();
5193 
5197  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5198  {
5199  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
5200  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5201  }
5202 
5203  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5204  {
5205  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
5206  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5207  }
5208 
5209  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5210  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type j = 0; j < n_cols; j++)
5211  {
5212  M2.get_row(j, row_vect_in_M2);
5213  result_vect = 0.;
5214  M1.vmult(result_vect,
5215  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5216  row_vect_in_M2,
5217  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5218  M.fill_col(j, result_vect);
5219  }
5220 }

5234 void
5235 h_f_mTmult(const Number alpha,
5236  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5237  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5238  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5239 {
5240  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n());
5241 
5242  Vector<Number> row_vect_in_M2(M2.n());
5243  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
5244 
5245  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m;
5246  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.m();
5247 
5251  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5252  {
5253  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
5254  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5255  }
5256 
5257  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5258  {
5259  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
5260  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5261  }
5262 
5263  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5264  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type j = 0; j < n_cols; j++)
5265  {
5266  M2.get_row(j, row_vect_in_M2);
5267  result_vect = 0.;
5268  M1.vmult(result_vect,
5269  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5270  alpha,
5271  row_vect_in_M2,
5272  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5273  M.fill_col(j, result_vect);
5274  }
5275 }

5291 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5292 void
5293 h_f_mmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5294  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5295  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5296 {
5297  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m());
5298 
5302  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M2_copy(M2);
5303 
5307  RkMatrix<Number> M2_rk(M2_copy);
5308 
5309  h_rk_mmult(M1, M2_rk, M);
5310 }

5329 void
5330 h_f_mmult(const Number alpha,
5331  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5332  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5333  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5334 {
5335  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m());
5336 
5340  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M2_copy(M2);
5341 
5345  RkMatrix<Number> M2_rk(M2_copy);
5346 
5347  h_rk_mmult(alpha, M1, M2_rk, M);
5348 }

5368  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
