5402 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5403 void
5404 h_f_mTmult(const Number alpha,
5405  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5406  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5407  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5408 {
5409  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n());
5410 
5414  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M2_copy(M2);
5415 
5419  RkMatrix<Number> M2_rk(M2_copy);
5420 
5421  h_rk_mTmult(alpha, M1, M2_rk, M);
5422 }
5423 
5424 
5434 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5435 void
5436 h_f_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M1,
5437  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M2,
5438  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M,
5439  bool is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P = true)
5440 {
5441  Assert(M2->type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M2->type));
5442  Assert(M2->fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
5443  // Assert(*(M1->col_indices) == *(M2->row_indices),
5444  // ExcMessage("Incompatible index sets during matrix
5445  // multiplication"));
5446  AssertDimension(M1->n, M2->m);
5447 
5448  // // DEBUG
5449  // print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::cout, "M1", *M1, "M2", *M2);
5450 
5451  if (is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P)
5452  {
5453  M->Sigma_P.pop_back();
5454  }
5455  else
5456  {
5457  M->remove_hmat_pair_from_mm_product_list(M1, M2);
5458  }
5459 
5460  if (M->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
5461  {
5465  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *M_full = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>();
5466  h_f_mmult(*M1, *(M2->fullmatrix), *M_full);
5467  M->Sigma_F.push_back(M_full);
5468 
5469  // // DEBUG
5470  // M_full->print_formatted(std::cout, 8, false, 16, "0");
5471 
5472  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_R.size(), 0);
5473  M->type = FullMatrixType;
5474  }
5475  else
5476  {
5480  RkMatrix<Number> *M_rk = new RkMatrix<Number>();
5481  h_f_mmult(*M1, *(M2->fullmatrix), *M_rk);
5482  M->Sigma_R.push_back(M_rk);
5483 
5484  // // DEBUG
5485  // LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M_rk_to_full;
5486  // M_rk->convertToFullMatrix(M_rk_to_full);
5487  // M_rk_to_full.print_formatted(std::cout, 8, false, 16, "0");
5488 
5489  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_F.size(), 0);
5490  M->type = RkMatrixType;
5491  }
5492 }
5493 
5494 
5502 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5503 void
5504 f_h_mmult(const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5505  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5506  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5507 {
5508  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.m);
5509 
5510  Vector<Number> row_vect_in_M1(M1.n());
5511  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.n);
5512 
5513  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m();
5514  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.n;
5515 
5519  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5520  {
5521  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
5522  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5523  }
5524 
5525  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5526  {
5527  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
5528  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5529  }
5530 
5531  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5532  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type i = 0; i < n_rows; i++)
5533  {
5534  M1.get_row(i, row_vect_in_M1);
5535  result_vect = 0.;
5536  M2.Tvmult(result_vect,
5537  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map,
5538  row_vect_in_M1,
5539  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5540  M.fill_row(i, result_vect);
5541  }
5542 }
5543 
5544 
5554 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5555 void
5556 f_h_mmult(const Number alpha,
5557  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5558  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5559  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5560 {
5561  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.m);
5562 
5563  Vector<Number> row_vect_in_M1(M1.n());
5564  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.n);
5565 
5566  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m();
5567  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.n;
5568 
5572  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5573  {
5574  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
5575  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5576  }
5577 
5578  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5579  {
5580  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
5581  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5582  }
5583 
5584  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5585  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type i = 0; i < n_rows; i++)
5586  {
5587  M1.get_row(i, row_vect_in_M1);
5592  result_vect = 0.;
5593  M2.Tvmult(result_vect,
5594  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map,
5595  alpha,
5596  row_vect_in_M1,
5597  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5598  M.fill_row(i, result_vect);
5599  }
5600 }
5601 
5602 
5611 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5612 void
5613 f_h_mTmult(const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5614  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5615  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5616 {
5617  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.n);
5618 
5619  Vector<Number> row_vect_in_M1(M1.n());
5620  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.m);
5621 
5622  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m();
5623  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.m;
5624 
5628  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5629  {
5630  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
5631  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5632  }
5633 
5634  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5635  {
5636  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
5637  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5638  }
5639 
5640  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5641  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type i = 0; i < n_rows; i++)
5642  {
5643  M1.get_row(i, row_vect_in_M1);
5644  result_vect = 0.;
5645  M2.vmult(result_vect,
5646  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5647  row_vect_in_M1,
5648  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5649  M.fill_row(i, result_vect);
5650  }
5651 }
5652 
5653 
5663 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5664 void
5665 f_h_mTmult(const Number alpha,
5666  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5667  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5668  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5669 {
5670  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.n);
5671 
5672  Vector<Number> row_vect_in_M1(M1.n());
5673  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.m);
5674 
5675  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m();
5676  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.m;
5677 
5681  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5682  {
5683  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
5684  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5685  }
5686 
5687  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5688  {
5689  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
5690  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5691  }
5692 
5693  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5694  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type i = 0; i < n_rows; i++)
5695  {
5696  M1.get_row(i, row_vect_in_M1);
5697  result_vect = 0.;
5698  M2.vmult(result_vect,
5699  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5700  alpha,
5701  row_vect_in_M1,
5702  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5703  M.fill_row(i, result_vect);
5704  }
5705 }
5706 
5707 
5716 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5717 void
5718 f_h_mmult(const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5719  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5720  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5721 {
5722  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.m);
5723 
5728  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M1_copy(M1);
5729  RkMatrix<Number> M1_rk(M1_copy);
5730  rk_h_mmult(M1_rk, M2, M);
5731 }
5732 
5733 
5743 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5744 void
5745 f_h_mmult(const Number alpha,
5746  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5747  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5748  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5749 {
5750  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.m);
5751 
5756  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M1_copy(M1);
5757  RkMatrix<Number> M1_rk(M1_copy);
5758  rk_h_mmult(alpha, M1_rk, M2, M);
5759 }
5760 
5761 
5770 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5771 void
5772 f_h_mTmult(const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5773  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5774  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5775 {
5776  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.n);
5777 
5782  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M1_copy(M1);
5783  RkMatrix<Number> M1_rk(M1_copy);
5784  rk_h_mTmult(M1_rk, M2, M);
5785 }
5786 
5787 
5797 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5798 void
5799 f_h_mTmult(const Number alpha,
5800  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5801  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5802  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5803 {
5804  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.n);
5805 
5810  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M1_copy(M1);
5811  RkMatrix<Number> M1_rk(M1_copy);
5812  rk_h_mTmult(alpha, M1_rk, M2, M);
5813 }
5814 
5815 
5825 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5826 void
5827 f_h_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M1,
5828  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M2,
5829  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M,
5830  bool is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P = true)
5831 {
5832  Assert(M1->type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M1->type));
5833  Assert(M1->fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
5834  // Assert(*(M1->col_indices) == *(M2->row_indices),
5835  // ExcMessage("Incompatible index sets during matrix
5836  // multiplication"));
5837  AssertDimension(M1->n, M2->m);
5838 
5839  // DEBUG
5840  // print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::cout, "M1", *M1, "M2", *M2);
5841 
5842  if (is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P)
5843  {
5844  M->Sigma_P.pop_back();
5845  }
5846  else
5847  {
5848  M->remove_hmat_pair_from_mm_product_list(M1, M2);
5849  }
5850 
5851  if (M->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
5852  {
5856  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *M_full = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>();
5857  f_h_mmult(*(M1->fullmatrix), *M2, *M_full);
5858  M->Sigma_F.push_back(M_full);
5859 
5860  // // DEBUG
5861  // M_full->print_formatted(std::cout, 8, false, 16, "0");
5862 
5863  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_R.size(), 0);
5864  M->type = FullMatrixType;
5865  }
5866  else
5867  {
5871  RkMatrix<Number> *M_rk = new RkMatrix<Number>();
5872  f_h_mmult(*(M1->fullmatrix), *M2, *M_rk);
5873  M->Sigma_R.push_back(M_rk);
5874 
5875  // // DEBUG
5876  // LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M_rk_to_full;
5877  // M_rk->convertToFullMatrix(M_rk_to_full);
5878  // M_rk_to_full.print_formatted(std::cout, 8, false, 16, "0");
5879 
5880  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_F.size(), 0);
5881  M->type = RkMatrixType;
5882  }
5883 }
5884 
5885 
5886 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5887 void
5888 h_h_mmult_phase1_recursion(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M,
5889  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &Tind)
5890 {
5891  M->h_h_mmult_reduction();
5892 
5893  if (M->Sigma_P.size() > 0)
5894  {
5899  TreeNodeSplitMode split_mode_of_mm =
5900  M->determine_mm_split_mode_from_Sigma_P();
5901 
5902  switch (split_mode_of_mm)
5903  {
5904  case HorizontalSplitMode:
5905  {
5906  M->h_h_mmult_horizontal_split(Tind);
5907 
5908  Assert(
5909  false,
5910  ExcMessage(
5911  "For level conserving H-matrix multiplication, HorizontalSplitMode should not appear!"));
5912 
5913  break;
5914  }
5915  case VerticalSplitMode:
5916  {
5917  M->h_h_mmult_vertical_split(Tind);
5918 
5919  Assert(
5920  false,
5921  ExcMessage(
5922  "For level conserving H-matrix multiplication, VerticalSplitMode should not appear!"));
5923 
5924  break;
5925  }
5926  case CrossSplitMode:
5927  {
5928  M->h_h_mmult_cross_split(Tind);
5929 
5930  break;
5931  }
5932  default:
5933  {
5934  Assert(
5935  false,
5936  ExcMessage(
5937  "Inconsistent case met during H-matrix MM multiplication"));
5938 
5939  break;
5940  }
5941  }
5942 
5950  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_P.size(), 0);
5951  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : M->submatrices)
5952  {
5953  h_h_mmult_phase1_recursion(submatrix, Tind);
5954  }
5955  }
5956 }
5957 
5958 
5959 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5960 void
5961 h_h_mmult_phase2(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M,
5962  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &target_bc_tree,
5963  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
5964 {
5968  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *hmat : M.leaf_set)
5969  {
5975  AssertDimension(hmat->Sigma_P.size(), 0);
5976 
5977  if (hmat->Sigma_R.size() > 0 && hmat->Sigma_F.size() == 0)
5978  {
5979  Assert(hmat->type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(hmat->type));
5980 
5987  Assert(
5988  hmat->rkmatrix == nullptr,
5989  ExcMessage(
5990  "The pointer hmat->rkmatrix should be nullptr before the following assignment:\n\nhmat->rkmatrix = hmat->Sigma_R[0];\n"));
5991  hmat->rkmatrix = hmat->Sigma_R[0];
5992  for (size_t i = 1; i < hmat->Sigma_R.size(); i++)
5993  {
5994  hmat->rkmatrix->add(*(hmat->Sigma_R[i]), fixed_rank);
5995  delete hmat->Sigma_R[i];
5996  hmat->Sigma_R[i] = nullptr;
5997  }
5998 
6003  hmat->Sigma_R.clear();
6004  }
6005  else if (hmat->Sigma_R.size() == 0 && hmat->Sigma_F.size() > 0)
6006  {
6007  Assert(hmat->type == FullMatrixType,
6008  ExcInvalidHMatrixType(hmat->type));
6009 
6010  Assert(
6011  hmat->fullmatrix == nullptr,
6012  ExcMessage(
6013  "The pointer hmat->fullmatrix should be nullptr before the following assignment:\n\nhmat->fullmatrix = hmat->Sigma_F[0];\n"));
6014  hmat->fullmatrix = hmat->Sigma_F[0];
6015  for (size_t i = 1; i < hmat->Sigma_F.size(); i++)
6016  {
6017  hmat->fullmatrix->add(*(hmat->Sigma_F[i]));
6018  delete hmat->Sigma_F[i];
6019  hmat->Sigma_F[i] = nullptr;
6020  }
6021 
6026  hmat->Sigma_F.clear();
6027  }
6028  else
6029  {
6030  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
6031  }
6032  }
6033 
6039  M.distribute_all_non_leaf_nodes_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(fixed_rank);
6040 
6044  M.convert_between_different_block_cluster_trees(M.Tind,
6045  target_bc_tree,
6046  fixed_rank);
6047 }
6048 
6049 
6068 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
6069 void
6070 h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
6071  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
6072  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
6073  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
6074  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
6075 {
6076  Assert(M0.bc_node->is_leaf(), ExcMessage("M0 should be a leaf node!"));
6077 
6078  // Array of empty child pointers used for initializing a block
6079  // cluster tree node.
6080  const std::array<
6081  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type,
6082  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::child_num>
6083  empty_child_pointers{nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr};
6084 
6090  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_value_type
6091  current_product_bc_node(
6092  BlockCluster<spacedim, Number>(
6093  M1.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node(),
6094  M2.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()),
6095  0,
6096  empty_child_pointers,
6097  nullptr,
6098  UnsplitMode);
6099 
6106  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6107  {
6108  Assert(M0.type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6109 
6110  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(true);
6111  }
6112  else
6113  {
6114  Assert(M0.type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6115 
6116  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(false);
6117  }
6118 
6124  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(&current_product_bc_node, fixed_rank);
6125  // Local variable storing the rank-k matrix obtained from multiplication
6126  // involving leaf node.
6127  RkMatrix<Number> ZR;
6128  // Local variable storing the full matrix obtained from multiplication
6129  // involving leaf node.
6130  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> ZF;
6131  // The result matrix type for the multiplication involving leaf node.
6132  HMatrixType result_matrix_type;
6133 
6134  if (M1.bc_node->is_leaf() || M2.bc_node->is_leaf())
6135  {
6140  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
6141  {
6142  rk_h_mmult(*(M1.rkmatrix), M2, ZR);
6143  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6144  }
6145  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
6146  {
6147  h_rk_mmult(M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), ZR);
6148  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6149  }
6150  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
6151  {
6152  f_h_mmult(*(M1.fullmatrix), M2, ZF);
6153  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6154  }
6155  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
6156  {
6157  h_f_mmult(M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), ZF);
6158  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6159  }
6160  else
6161  {
6162  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
6163  }
6164 
6165  if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
6166  {
6167  // The desired result should be a rank-k matrix.
6168  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6169  {
6170  *(Z.rkmatrix) = ZR;
6171  }
6172  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6173  {
6174  // Convert the full matrix to rank-k matrix.
6175  *(Z.rkmatrix) = RkMatrix<Number>(fixed_rank, ZF);
6176  }
6177  else
6178  {
6179  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6180  }
6181  }
6182  else if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
6183  {
6184  // The desired result should be a full matrix.
6185  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6186  {
6187  // Convert the rank-k matrix to full matrix.
6188  ZR.convertToFullMatrix(*(Z.fullmatrix));
6189  }
6190  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6191  {
6192  *(Z.fullmatrix) = ZF;
6193  }
6194  else
6195  {
6196  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6197  }
6198  }
6199  else
6200  {
6201  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(Z.type));
6202  }
6203  }
6204  else
6205  {
6212  const unsigned int local_fixed_rank =
6213  std::min(fixed_rank * 2, std::min(Z.m, Z.n));
6214 
6215  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6216  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[0]), *(M2.submatrices[0]), local_fixed_rank);
6217  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6218  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[1]), *(M2.submatrices[2]), local_fixed_rank);
6219  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6220  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[0]), *(M2.submatrices[1]), local_fixed_rank);
6221  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6222  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[1]), *(M2.submatrices[3]), local_fixed_rank);
6223  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6224  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[2]), *(M2.submatrices[0]), local_fixed_rank);
6225  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6226  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[3]), *(M2.submatrices[2]), local_fixed_rank);
6227  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6228  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[2]), *(M2.submatrices[1]), local_fixed_rank);
6229  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6230  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[3]), *(M2.submatrices[3]), local_fixed_rank);
6231  }
6232 
6236  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6237  {
6242  Assert(M.fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6243 
6244  M.fullmatrix->fill(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6245  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6246  *(Z.fullmatrix),
6247  *(Z.row_indices),
6248  *(Z.col_indices),
6249  true);
6250  }
6251  else
6252  {
6259  Assert(M.rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6260 
6261  M.rkmatrix->assemble_from_rkmatrix(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6262  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6263  *(Z.rkmatrix),
6264  *(Z.row_indices),
6265  *(Z.col_indices),
6266  fixed_rank);
6267  // // DEBUG
6268  // std::cout << "M.rkmatrix: [";
6269  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M.row_indices), ",", false);
6270  // std::cout << "],[";
6271  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M1.col_indices), ",", false);
6272  // std::cout << "],[";
6273  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M.col_indices), ",", false);
6274  // std::cout << "] assembled from [";
6275  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(Z.row_indices), ",", false);
6276  // std::cout << "],[";
6277  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(Z.col_indices), ",", false);
6278  // std::cout << "]\n";
6279  // std::cout << "M.rkmatrix: formal_rank=" <<
6280  // M.rkmatrix->get_formal_rank()
6281  // << ", rank=" << M.rkmatrix->get_rank() << std::endl;
6282  }
6283 }
6284 
6285 
6304 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
6305 void
6306 h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
6307  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
6308  const Number alpha,
6309  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
6310  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
6311  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
6312 {
6313  // DEBUG
6314  // std::cout << "h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node: ";
6315  // print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::cout, "M1", M1, "M2", M2);
6316  // std::cout << " = ";
6317  // print_h_submatrix_accessor(std::cout, "M", M);
6318  // std::cout << std::endl;
6319 
6320  Assert(M0.bc_node->is_leaf(), ExcMessage("M0 should be a leaf node!"));
6321 
6322  // Array of empty child pointers used for initializing a block
6323  // cluster tree node.
6324  const std::array<
6325  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type,
6326  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::child_num>
6327  empty_child_pointers{nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr};
6328 
6334  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_value_type
6335  current_product_bc_node(
6336  BlockCluster<spacedim, Number>(
6337  M1.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node(),
6338  M2.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()),
6339  0,
6340  empty_child_pointers,
6341  nullptr,
6342  UnsplitMode);
6343 
6350  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6351  {
6352  Assert(M0.type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6353 
6354  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(true);
6355  }
6356  else
6357  {
6358  Assert(M0.type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6359 
6360  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(false);
6361  }
6362 
6368  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(&current_product_bc_node, fixed_rank);
6369  // Local variable storing the rank-k matrix obtained from multiplication
6370  // involving leaf node.
6371  RkMatrix<Number> ZR;
6372  // Local variable storing the full matrix obtained from multiplication
6373  // involving leaf node.
6374  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> ZF;
6375  // The result matrix type for the multiplication involving leaf node.
6376  HMatrixType result_matrix_type;
6377 
6378  if (M1.bc_node->is_leaf() || M2.bc_node->is_leaf())
6379  {
6384  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
6385  {
6386  rk_h_mmult(alpha, *(M1.rkmatrix), M2, ZR);
6387  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6388  }
6389  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
6390  {
6391  h_rk_mmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), ZR);
6392  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6393  }
6394  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
6395  {
6396  f_h_mmult(alpha, *(M1.fullmatrix), M2, ZF);
6397  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6398  }
6399  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
6400  {
6401  h_f_mmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), ZF);
6402  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6403  }
6404  else
6405  {
6406  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
6407  }
6408 
6409  if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
6410  {
6411  // The desired result should be a rank-k matrix.
6412  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6413  {
6414  *(Z.rkmatrix) = ZR;
6415  }
6416  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6417  {
6418  // Convert the full matrix to rank-k matrix.
6419  *(Z.rkmatrix) = RkMatrix<Number>(fixed_rank, ZF);
6420  }
6421  else
6422  {
6423  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6424  }
6425  }
6426  else if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
6427  {
6428  // The desired result should be a full matrix.
6429  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6430  {
6431  // Convert the rank-k matrix to full matrix.
6432  ZR.convertToFullMatrix(*(Z.fullmatrix));
6433  }
6434  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6435  {
6436  *(Z.fullmatrix) = ZF;
6437  }
6438  else
6439  {
6440  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6441  }
6442  }
6443  else
6444  {
6445  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(Z.type));
6446  }
6447  }
6448  else
6449  {
6456  const unsigned int local_fixed_rank =
6457  std::min(fixed_rank * 2, std::min(Z.m, Z.n));
6458 
6459  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6460  Z,
6461  alpha,
6462  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
6463  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
6464  local_fixed_rank);
6465  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6466  Z,
6467  alpha,
6468  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
6469  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
6470  local_fixed_rank);
6471  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6472  Z,
6473  alpha,
6474  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
6475  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
6476  local_fixed_rank);
6477  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6478  Z,
6479  alpha,
6480  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
6481  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
6482  local_fixed_rank);
6483  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6484  Z,
6485  alpha,
6486  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
6487  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
6488  local_fixed_rank);
6489  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6490  Z,
6491  alpha,
6492  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
6493  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
6494  local_fixed_rank);
6495  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6496  Z,
6497  alpha,
6498  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
6499  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
6500  local_fixed_rank);
6501  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6502  Z,
6503  alpha,
6504  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
6505  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
6506  local_fixed_rank);
6507  }
6508 
6512  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6513  {
6518  Assert(M.fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6519 
6520  M.fullmatrix->fill(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6521  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6522  *(Z.fullmatrix),
6523  *(Z.row_indices),
6524  *(Z.col_indices),
6525  true);
6526  }
6527  else
6528  {
6535  Assert(M.rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6536 
6537  // DEBUG
6538  // Z.rkmatrix->print_formatted_to_mat(std::cout, "Z", 15, false, 25,
6539  // "0");
6540 
6541  M.rkmatrix->assemble_from_rkmatrix(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6542  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6543  *(Z.rkmatrix),
6544  *(Z.row_indices),
6545  *(Z.col_indices),
6546  fixed_rank);
6547  }
6548 }
6549 
6550 
6568 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
6569 void
6570 h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
6571  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
6572  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
6573  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
6574  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
6575 {
6576  Assert(M0.bc_node->is_leaf(), ExcMessage("M0 should be a leaf node!"));
6577 
6578  // Array of empty child pointers used for initializing a block
6579  // cluster tree node.
6580  const std::array<
6581  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type,
6582  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::child_num>
6583  empty_child_pointers{nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr};
6584 
6590  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_value_type
6591  current_product_bc_node(BlockCluster<spacedim, Number>(
6592  M1.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node(),
6593  M2.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()),
6594  0,
6595  empty_child_pointers,
6596  nullptr,
6597  UnsplitMode);
6598 
6605  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6606  {
6607  Assert(M0.type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6608 
6609  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(true);
6610  }
6611  else
6612  {
6613  Assert(M0.type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6614 
6615  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(false);
6616  }
6617 
6623  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(&current_product_bc_node, fixed_rank);
6624  // Local variable storing the rank-k matrix obtained from multiplication
6625  // involving leaf node.
6626  RkMatrix<Number> ZR;
6627  // Local variable storing the full matrix obtained from multiplication
6628  // involving leaf node.
6629  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> ZF;
6630  // The result matrix type for the multiplication involving leaf node.
6631  HMatrixType result_matrix_type;
6632 
6633  if (M1.bc_node->is_leaf() || M2.bc_node->is_leaf())
6634  {
6639  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
6640  {
6641  rk_h_mTmult(*(M1.rkmatrix), M2, ZR);
6642  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6643  }
6644  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
6645  {
6646  h_rk_mTmult(M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), ZR);
6647  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6648  }
6649  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
6650  {
6651  f_h_mTmult(*(M1.fullmatrix), M2, ZF);
6652  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6653  }
6654  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
6655  {
6656  h_f_mTmult(M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), ZF);
6657  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6658  }
6659  else
6660  {
6661  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
6662  }
6663 
6664  if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
6665  {
6666  // The desired result should be a rank-k matrix.
6667  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6668  {
6669  *(Z.rkmatrix) = ZR;
6670  }
6671  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6672  {
6673  // Convert the full matrix to rank-k matrix.
6674  *(Z.rkmatrix) = RkMatrix<Number>(fixed_rank, ZF);
6675  }
6676  else
6677  {
6678  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6679  }
6680  }
6681  else if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
6682  {
6683  // The desired result should be a full matrix.
6684  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6685  {
6686  // Convert the rank-k matrix to full matrix.
6687  ZR.convertToFullMatrix(*(Z.fullmatrix));
6688  }
6689  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6690  {
6691  *(Z.fullmatrix) = ZF;
6692  }
6693  else
6694  {
6695  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6696  }
6697  }
6698  else
6699  {
6700  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(Z.type));
6701  }
6702  }
6703  else
6704  {
6711  const unsigned int local_fixed_rank =
6712  std::min(fixed_rank * 2, std::min(Z.m, Z.n));
6713 
6714  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6715  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[0]), *(M2.submatrices[0]), local_fixed_rank);
6716  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6717  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[1]), *(M2.submatrices[1]), local_fixed_rank);
6718  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6719  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[0]), *(M2.submatrices[2]), local_fixed_rank);
6720  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6721  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[1]), *(M2.submatrices[3]), local_fixed_rank);
6722  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6723  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[2]), *(M2.submatrices[0]), local_fixed_rank);
6724  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6725  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[3]), *(M2.submatrices[1]), local_fixed_rank);
6726  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6727  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[2]), *(M2.submatrices[2]), local_fixed_rank);
6728  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6729  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[3]), *(M2.submatrices[3]), local_fixed_rank);
6730  }
6731 
6735  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6736  {
6741  Assert(M.fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6742 
6743  M.fullmatrix->fill(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6744  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6745  *(Z.fullmatrix),
6746  *(Z.row_indices),
6747  *(Z.col_indices),
6748  true);
6749  }
6750  else
6751  {
6758  Assert(M.rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6759 
6760  M.rkmatrix->assemble_from_rkmatrix(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6761  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6762  *(Z.rkmatrix),
6763  *(Z.row_indices),
6764  *(Z.col_indices),
6765  fixed_rank);
6766  }
6767 }
6768 
6769 
6787 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
6788 void
6789 h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
6790  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
6791  const Number alpha,
6792  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
6793  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
6794  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
6795 {
6796  Assert(M0.bc_node->is_leaf(), ExcMessage("M0 should be a leaf node!"));
6797 
6798  // Array of empty child pointers used for initializing a block
6799  // cluster tree node.
6800  const std::array<
6801  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type,
6802  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::child_num>
6803  empty_child_pointers{nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr};
6804 
6810  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_value_type
6811  current_product_bc_node(BlockCluster<spacedim, Number>(
6812  M1.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node(),
6813  M2.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()),
6814  0,
6815  empty_child_pointers,
6816  nullptr,
6817  UnsplitMode);
6818 
6825  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6826  {
6827  Assert(M0.type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6828 
6829  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(true);
6830  }
6831  else
6832  {
6833  Assert(M0.type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6834 
6835  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(false);
6836  }
6837 
6843  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(&current_product_bc_node, fixed_rank);
6844  // Local variable storing the rank-k matrix obtained from multiplication
6845  // involving leaf node.
6846  RkMatrix<Number> ZR;
6847  // Local variable storing the full matrix obtained from multiplication
6848  // involving leaf node.
6849  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> ZF;
6850  // The result matrix type for the multiplication involving leaf node.
6851  HMatrixType result_matrix_type;
6852 
6853  if (M1.bc_node->is_leaf() || M2.bc_node->is_leaf())
6854  {
6859  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
6860  {
6861  rk_h_mTmult(alpha, *(M1.rkmatrix), M2, ZR);
6862  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6863  }
6864  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
6865  {
6866  h_rk_mTmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), ZR);
6867  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6868  }
6869  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
6870  {
6871  f_h_mTmult(alpha, *(M1.fullmatrix), M2, ZF);
6872  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6873  }
6874  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
6875  {
6876  h_f_mTmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), ZF);
6877  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6878  }
6879  else
6880  {
6881  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
6882  }
6883 
6884  if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
6885  {
6886  // The desired result should be a rank-k matrix.
6887  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6888  {
6889  *(Z.rkmatrix) = ZR;
6890  }
6891  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6892  {
6893  // Convert the full matrix to rank-k matrix.
6894  *(Z.rkmatrix) = RkMatrix<Number>(fixed_rank, ZF);
6895  }
6896  else
6897  {
6898  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6899  }
6900  }
6901  else if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
6902  {
6903  // The desired result should be a full matrix.
6904  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6905  {
6906  // Convert the rank-k matrix to full matrix.
6907  ZR.convertToFullMatrix(*(Z.fullmatrix));
6908  }
6909  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6910  {
6911  *(Z.fullmatrix) = ZF;
6912  }
6913  else
6914  {
6915  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6916  }
6917  }
6918  else
6919  {
6920  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(Z.type));
6921  }
6922  }
6923  else
6924  {
6931  const unsigned int local_fixed_rank =
6932  std::min(fixed_rank * 2, std::min(Z.m, Z.n));
6933 
6934  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6935  Z,
6936  alpha,
6937  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
6938  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
6939  local_fixed_rank);
6940  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6941  Z,
6942  alpha,
6943  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
6944  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
6945  local_fixed_rank);
6946  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6947  Z,
6948  alpha,
6949  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
6950  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
6951  local_fixed_rank);
6952  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6953  Z,
6954  alpha,
6955  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
6956  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
6957  local_fixed_rank);
6958  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6959  Z,
6960  alpha,
6961  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
6962  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
6963  local_fixed_rank);
6964  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6965  Z,
6966  alpha,
6967  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
6968  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
6969  local_fixed_rank);
6970  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6971  Z,
6972  alpha,
6973  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
6974  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
6975  local_fixed_rank);
6976  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6977  Z,
6978  alpha,
6979  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
6980  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
6981  local_fixed_rank);
6982  }
6983 
6987  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6988  {
6993  Assert(M.fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6994 
6995  M.fullmatrix->fill(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6996  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6997  *(Z.fullmatrix),
6998  *(Z.row_indices),
6999  *(Z.col_indices),
7000  true);
7001  }
7002  else
7003  {
7010  Assert(M.rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
7011 
7012  M.rkmatrix->assemble_from_rkmatrix(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
7013  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
7014  *(Z.rkmatrix),
7015  *(Z.row_indices),
7016  *(Z.col_indices),
7017  fixed_rank);
7018  }
7019 }
7020 
7021 
7035 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7036 void
7037 h_h_mmult_level_conserving(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
7038  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
7039  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
7040  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
7041  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
7042 {
7043  // // DEBUG
7044  // std::cout << "mmult: ([";
7045  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M1.row_indices), ",", false);
7046  // std::cout << "],[";
7047  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M1.col_indices), ",", false);
7048  // std::cout << "]) * ([";
7049  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M2.row_indices), ",", false);
7050  // std::cout << "],[";
7051  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M2.col_indices), ",", false);
7052  // std::cout << "]) = ([";
7053  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M.row_indices), ",", false);
7054  // std::cout << "],[";
7055  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M.col_indices), ",", false);
7056  // std::cout << "])" << std::endl;
7057 
7058  if (!(M1.bc_node->is_leaf()) && !(M2.bc_node->is_leaf()) &&
7059  !(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7060  {
7061  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7062  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7063  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7064  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7065  fixed_rank);
7066  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7067  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7068  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7069  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7070  fixed_rank);
7071  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7072  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7073  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7074  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7075  fixed_rank);
7076  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7077  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7078  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7079  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7080  fixed_rank);
7081  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7082  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7083  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7084  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7085  fixed_rank);
7086  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7087  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7088  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7089  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7090  fixed_rank);
7091  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7092  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7093  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7094  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7095  fixed_rank);
7096  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7097  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7098  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7099  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7100  fixed_rank);
7101  }
7102  else if (!(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7103  {
7104  RkMatrix<Number> Z;
7105  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
7106  {
7107  rk_h_mmult(*(M1.rkmatrix), M2, Z);
7108  }
7109  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
7110  {
7111  h_rk_mmult(M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), Z);
7112  }
7113  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
7114  {
7115  f_h_mmult(*(M1.fullmatrix), M2, Z);
7116  }
7117  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
7118  {
7119  h_f_mmult(M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), Z);
7120  }
7121  else
7122  {
7123  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
7124  }
7125 
7126  M.add(Z, fixed_rank);
7127  }
7128  else
7129  {
7130  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M, M, M1, M2, fixed_rank);
7131  }
7132 }
7133 
7134 
7150 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7151 void
7152 h_h_mmult_level_conserving(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
7153  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
7154  const Number alpha,
7155  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
7156  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
7157  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
7158 {
7159  // DEBUG
7160  // std::cout << "h_h_mmult_level_conserving: ";
7161  // print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::cout, "M1", M1, "M2", M2);
7162  // std::cout << " = ";
7163  // print_h_submatrix_accessor(std::cout, "M", M);
7164  // std::cout << std::endl;
7165 
7166  if (!(M1.bc_node->is_leaf()) && !(M2.bc_node->is_leaf()) &&
7167  !(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7168  {
7169  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7170  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7171  alpha,
7172  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7173  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7174  fixed_rank);
7175  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7176  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7177  alpha,
7178  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7179  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7180  fixed_rank);
7181  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7182  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7183  alpha,
7184  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7185  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7186  fixed_rank);
7187  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7188  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7189  alpha,
7190  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7191  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7192  fixed_rank);
7193  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7194  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7195  alpha,
7196  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7197  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7198  fixed_rank);
7199  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7200  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7201  alpha,
7202  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7203  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7204  fixed_rank);
7205  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7206  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7207  alpha,
7208  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7209  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7210  fixed_rank);
7211  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7212  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7213  alpha,
7214  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7215  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7216  fixed_rank);
7217  }
7218  else if (!(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7219  {
7220  RkMatrix<Number> Z;
7221  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
7222  {
7223  rk_h_mmult(alpha, *(M1.rkmatrix), M2, Z);
7224  }
7225  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
7226  {
7227  h_rk_mmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), Z);
7228  }
7229  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
7230  {
7231  f_h_mmult(alpha, *(M1.fullmatrix), M2, Z);
7232  }
7233  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
7234  {
7235  h_f_mmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), Z);
7236  }
7237  else
7238  {
7239  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
7240  }
7241 
7242  M.add(Z, fixed_rank);
7243  }
7244  else
7245  {
7246  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M, M, alpha, M1, M2, fixed_rank);
7247  }
7248 }
7249 
7250 
7265 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7266 void
7267 h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
7268  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
7269  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
7270  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
7271  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
7272 {
7273  if (!(M1.bc_node->is_leaf()) && !(M2.bc_node->is_leaf()) &&
7274  !(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7275  {
7276  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7277  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7278  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7279  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7280  fixed_rank);
7281  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7282  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7283  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7284  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7285  fixed_rank);
7286  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7287  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7288  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7289  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7290  fixed_rank);
7291  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7292  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7293  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7294  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7295  fixed_rank);
7296  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7297  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7298  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7299  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7300  fixed_rank);
7301  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7302  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7303  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7304  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7305  fixed_rank);
7306  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7307  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7308  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7309  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7310  fixed_rank);
7311  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7312  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7313  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7314  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7315  fixed_rank);
7316  }
7317  else if (!(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7318  {
7319  RkMatrix<Number> Z;
7320  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
7321  {
7322  rk_h_mTmult(*(M1.rkmatrix), M2, Z);
7323  }
7324  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
7325  {
7326  h_rk_mTmult(M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), Z);
7327  }
7328  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
7329  {
7330  f_h_mTmult(*(M1.fullmatrix), M2, Z);
7331  }
7332  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
7333  {
7334  h_f_mTmult(M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), Z);
7335  }
7336  else
7337  {
7338  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
7339  }
7340 
7341  M.add(Z, fixed_rank);
7342  }
7343  else
7344  {
7345  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M, M, M1, M2, fixed_rank);
7346  }
7347 }
7348 
7349 
7365 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7366 void
7367 h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
7368  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
7369  const Number alpha,
7370  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
7371  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
7372  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
7373 {
7374  if (!(M1.bc_node->is_leaf()) && !(M2.bc_node->is_leaf()) &&
7375  !(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7376  {
7377  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7378  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7379  alpha,
7380  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7381  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7382  fixed_rank);
7383  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7384  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7385  alpha,
7386  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7387  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7388  fixed_rank);
7389  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7390  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7391  alpha,
7392  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7393  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7394  fixed_rank);
7395  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7396  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7397  alpha,
7398  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7399  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7400  fixed_rank);
7401  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7402  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7403  alpha,
7404  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7405  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7406  fixed_rank);
7407  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7408  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7409  alpha,
7410  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7411  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7412  fixed_rank);
7413  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7414  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7415  alpha,
7416  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7417  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7418  fixed_rank);
7419  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7420  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7421  alpha,
7422  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7423  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7424  fixed_rank);
7425  }
7426  else if (!(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7427  {
7428  RkMatrix<Number> Z;
7429  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
7430  {
7431  rk_h_mTmult(alpha, *(M1.rkmatrix), M2, Z);
7432  }
7433  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
7434  {
7435  h_rk_mTmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), Z);
7436  }
7437  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
7438  {
7439  f_h_mTmult(alpha, *(M1.fullmatrix), M2, Z);
7440  }
7441  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
7442  {
7443  h_f_mTmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), Z);
7444  }
7445  else
7446  {
7447  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
7448  }
7449 
7450  M.add(Z, fixed_rank);
7451  }
7452  else
7453  {
7454  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M, M, alpha, M1, M2, fixed_rank);
7455  }
7456 }
7457 
7458 
7478 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
7479 void
7480 copy_hmatrix_node(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & hmat_dst,
7481  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &hmat_src)
7482 {
7483  hmat_dst.type = hmat_src.type;
7484  hmat_dst.submatrix_index = hmat_src.submatrix_index;
7485 
7489  if (hmat_src.rkmatrix != nullptr)
7490  {
7491  hmat_dst.rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(*(hmat_src.rkmatrix));
7492  }
7493  else
7494  {
7495  hmat_dst.rkmatrix = nullptr;
7496  }
7497 
7501  if (hmat_src.fullmatrix != nullptr)
7502  {
7503  hmat_dst.fullmatrix =
7504  new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(*(hmat_src.fullmatrix));
7505  }
7506  else
7507  {
7508  hmat_dst.fullmatrix = nullptr;
7509  }
7510 
7511  hmat_dst.bc_node = hmat_src.bc_node;
7512  hmat_dst.row_indices = hmat_src.row_indices;
7513  hmat_dst.col_indices = hmat_src.col_indices;
7514  hmat_dst.row_index_global_to_local_map =
7515  hmat_src.row_index_global_to_local_map;
7516  hmat_dst.col_index_global_to_local_map =
7517  hmat_src.col_index_global_to_local_map;
7518  hmat_dst.m = hmat_src.m;
7519  hmat_dst.n = hmat_src.n;
7520 }
7521 
7522 
7530 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
7531 void
7532 copy_hmatrix_node(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & hmat_dst,
7533  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &&hmat_src)
7534 {
7535  hmat_dst.type = hmat_src.type;
7536  hmat_dst.submatrices = hmat_src.submatrices;
7537  hmat_dst.submatrix_index = hmat_src.submatrix_index;
7538  hmat_dst.parent = hmat_src.parent;
7539  hmat_dst.leaf_set = hmat_src.leaf_set;
7540  hmat_dst.rkmatrix = hmat_src.rkmatrix;
7541  hmat_dst.fullmatrix = hmat_src.fullmatrix;
7542  hmat_dst.bc_node = hmat_src.bc_node;
7543  hmat_dst.row_indices = hmat_src.row_indices;
7544  hmat_dst.col_indices = hmat_src.col_indices;
7545  hmat_dst.row_index_global_to_local_map =
7546  hmat_src.row_index_global_to_local_map;
7547  hmat_dst.col_index_global_to_local_map =
7548  hmat_src.col_index_global_to_local_map;
7549  hmat_dst.m = hmat_src.m;
7550  hmat_dst.n = hmat_src.n;
7551  hmat_dst.Sigma_P = hmat_src.Sigma_P;
7552  hmat_dst.Sigma_R = hmat_src.Sigma_R;
7553  hmat_dst.Sigma_F = hmat_src.Sigma_F;
7554  hmat_dst.Tind = std::move(hmat_src.Tind);
7555 }
7556 
7557 
7563 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
7564 void
7565 copy_hmatrix(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & hmat_dst,
7566  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &hmat_src)
7567 {
7571  copy_hmatrix_node(hmat_dst, hmat_src);
7572 
7576  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : hmat_src.submatrices)
7577  {
7578  Assert(submatrix, ExcInternalError());
7579 
7585  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
7586  copy_hmatrix(*child_hmat, *submatrix);
7587  hmat_dst.submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
7588  child_hmat->parent = &hmat_dst;
7589  }
7590 }
7591 
7592 
7593 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
7594 void
7595 print_h_submatrix_accessor(std::ostream & out,
7596  const std::string & name,
7597  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M)
7598 {
7599  out << name + std::string("([") << std::flush;
7600  print_vector_values(out, *(M.row_indices), ",", false);
7601  out << "],[" << std::flush;
7602  print_vector_values(out, *(M.col_indices), ",", false);
7603  out << "])";
7604 }
7605 
7606 
7607 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
7608 void
7609 print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::ostream & out,
7610  const std::string & name1,
7611  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
7612  const std::string & name2,
7613  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2)
7614 {
7615  print_h_submatrix_accessor(out, name1, M1);
7616  out << " * ";
7617  print_h_submatrix_accessor(out, name2, M2);
7618 }
7619 
7620 
7621 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7622 void
7623 hmatrix_solve_lu(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &L,
7624  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &U,
7625  Vector<Number> & x,
7626  const Vector<Number> & b)
7627 {
7628  x = b;
7629  L.solve_by_forward_substitution(x, true);
7630  U.solve_by_backward_substitution(x, false);
7631 }
7632 
7633 
7634 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7635 void
7636 hmatrix_solve_cholesky(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &L,
7637  Vector<Number> & x,
7638  const Vector<Number> & b)
7639 {
7640  x = b;
7641  L.solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution(x);
7642  L.solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(x);
7643 }
7644 
7645 
7646 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7647 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix()
7648  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7649  , submatrices(0)
7650  , parent(nullptr)
7651  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7652  , leaf_set(0)
7653  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7654  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7655  , bc_node(nullptr)
7656  , row_indices(nullptr)
7657  , col_indices(nullptr)
7658  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7659  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7660  , m(0)
7661  , n(0)
7662  , Tind()
7663  , Sigma_P(0)
7664  , Sigma_R(0)
7665  , Sigma_F(0)
7666 {}
7667 
7668 
7669 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7670 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7671  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct,
7672  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
7673  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7674  , submatrices(0)
7675  , parent(nullptr)
7676  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7677  , leaf_set(0)
7678  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7679  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7680  , bc_node(nullptr)
7681  , row_indices(nullptr)
7682  , col_indices(nullptr)
7683  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7684  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7685  , m(0)
7686  , n(0)
7687  , Tind()
7688  , Sigma_P(0)
7689  , Sigma_R(0)
7690  , Sigma_F(0)
7691 {
7692  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bct.get_root(), fixed_rank_k);
7693  build_leaf_set();
7694 }
7695 
7696 
7697 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7698 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7699  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
7700  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
7701  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7702  , submatrices(0)
7703  , parent(nullptr)
7704  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7705  , leaf_set(0)
7706  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7707  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7708  , bc_node(nullptr)
7709  , row_indices(nullptr)
7710  , col_indices(nullptr)
7711  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7712  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7713  , m(0)
7714  , n(0)
7715  , Tind()
7716  , Sigma_P(0)
7717  , Sigma_R(0)
7718  , Sigma_F(0)
7719 {
7720  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bc_node, fixed_rank_k);
7721  build_leaf_set();
7722 }

7725 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7726 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7727  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct,
7728  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M,
7729  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
7730  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7731  , submatrices(0)
7732  , parent(nullptr)
7733  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7734  , leaf_set(0)
7735  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7736  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7737  , bc_node(nullptr)
7738  , row_indices(nullptr)
7739  , col_indices(nullptr)
7740  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7741  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7742  , m(0)
7743  , n(0)
7744  , Tind()
7745  , Sigma_P(0)
7746  , Sigma_R(0)
7747  , Sigma_F(0)
7748 {
7749  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bct.get_root(), fixed_rank_k, M);
7750  build_leaf_set();
7751 }

7754 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7755 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7756  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
7757  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M,
7758  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
7759  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7760  , submatrices(0)
7761  , parent(nullptr)
7762  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7763  , leaf_set(0)
7764  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7765  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7766  , bc_node(nullptr)
7767  , row_indices(nullptr)
7768  , col_indices(nullptr)
7769  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7770  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7771  , m(0)
7772  , n(0)
7773  , Tind()
7774  , Sigma_P(0)
7775  , Sigma_R(0)
7776  , Sigma_F(0)
7777 {
7778  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bc_node, fixed_rank_k, M);
7779  build_leaf_set();
7780 }
