7782 
7783 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7784 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7785  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
7786  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> && H)
7787  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7788  , submatrices(0)
7789  , parent(nullptr)
7790  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7791  , leaf_set(0)
7792  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7793  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7794  , bc_node(nullptr)
7795  , row_indices(nullptr)
7796  , col_indices(nullptr)
7797  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7798  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7799  , m(0)
7800  , n(0)
7801  , Tind(std::move(H.Tind))
7802  , Sigma_P(0)
7803  , Sigma_R(0)
7804  , Sigma_F(0)
7805 {
7806  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bc_node, std::move(H));
7807  build_leaf_set();
7808 }
7809 
7810 
7811 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7812 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7813  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct,
7814  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> && H)
7815  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7816  , submatrices(0)
7817  , parent(nullptr)
7818  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7819  , leaf_set(0)
7820  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7821  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7822  , bc_node(nullptr)
7823  , row_indices(nullptr)
7824  , col_indices(nullptr)
7825  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7826  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7827  , m(0)
7828  , n(0)
7829  , Tind(std::move(H.Tind))
7830  , Sigma_P(0)
7831  , Sigma_R(0)
7832  , Sigma_F(0)
7833 {
7834  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bct.get_root(), std::move(H));
7835  build_leaf_set();
7836 }
7837 
7838 
7839 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7840 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &H)
7841  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7842  , submatrices(0)
7843  , parent(nullptr)
7844  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7845  , leaf_set(0)
7846  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7847  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7848  , bc_node(nullptr)
7849  , row_indices(nullptr)
7850  , col_indices(nullptr)
7851  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7852  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7853  , m(0)
7854  , n(0)
7855  , Tind()
7856  , Sigma_P(0)
7857  , Sigma_R(0)
7858  , Sigma_F(0)
7859 {
7860  copy_hmatrix(*this, H);
7861  build_leaf_set();
7862 }
7863 
7864 
7865 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7866 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &&H)
7867  : type(H.type)
7868  , submatrices(H.submatrices)
7869  , parent(H.parent)
7870  , submatrix_index(H.submatrix_index)
7871  , leaf_set(H.leaf_set)
7872  , rkmatrix(H.rkmatrix)
7873  , fullmatrix(H.fullmatrix)
7874  , bc_node(H.bc_node)
7875  , row_indices(H.row_indices)
7876  , col_indices(H.col_indices)
7877  , row_index_global_to_local_map(H.row_index_global_to_local_map)
7878  , col_index_global_to_local_map(H.col_index_global_to_local_map)
7879  , m(H.m)
7880  , n(H.n)
7881  , Tind(std::move(H.Tind))
7882  , Sigma_P(H.Sigma_P)
7883  , Sigma_R(H.Sigma_R)
7884  , Sigma_F(H.Sigma_F)
7885 {
7886  H.clear_hmat_node();
7887 }
7888 
7889 
7890 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7891 void
7892 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::reinit(const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct,
7893  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
7894 {
7895  release();
7896  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bct.get_root(), fixed_rank_k);
7897  build_leaf_set();
7898 }
7899 
7900 
7901 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7902 void
7903 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::reinit(
7904  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
7905  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
7906 {
7907  release();
7908  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bc_node, fixed_rank_k);
7909  build_leaf_set();
7910 }
7911 
7912 
7913 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7914 HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &
7915 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::operator=(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &&H)
7916 {
7917  release();
7918  copy_hmatrix_node((*this), std::move(H));
7919  H.clear_hmat_node();
7920 
7921  return (*this);
7922 }
7923 
7924 
7925 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7926 HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &
7927 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::operator=(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &H)
7928 {
7929  release();
7930  copy_hmatrix(*this, H);
7931  build_leaf_set();
7932 
7933  return (*this);
7934 }
7935 
7936 
7937 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7938 template <typename MatrixType>
7939 void
7940 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::convertToFullMatrix(MatrixType &M) const
7941 {
7942  M.reinit(m, n);
7943  _convertToFullMatrix(M);
7944 }
7945 
7946 
7947 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7948 template <typename MatrixType>
7949 void
7950 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::_convertToFullMatrix(MatrixType &M) const
7951 {
7952  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> matrix_block;
7953 
7954  switch (type)
7955  {
7956  case FullMatrixType:
7957  Assert(fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
7958 
7959  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
7960  {
7961  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
7962  {
7963  M(row_indices->at(i), col_indices->at(j)) = (*fullmatrix)(i, j);
7964  }
7965  }
7966 
7967  break;
7968  case RkMatrixType:
7969  Assert(rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
7970 
7971  rkmatrix->convertToFullMatrix(matrix_block);
7972 
7973  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
7974  {
7975  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
7976  {
7977  M(row_indices->at(i), col_indices->at(j)) = matrix_block(i, j);
7978  }
7979  }
7980 
7981  break;
7982  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
7983  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
7984  {
7985  submatrix->_convertToFullMatrix(M);
7986  }
7987 
7988  break;
7989  default:
7990  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
7991  }
7992 }
7993 
7994 
7995 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7996 void
7997 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::_build_leaf_set(
7998  std::vector<HMatrix *> &total_leaf_set) const
7999 {
8000  switch (type)
8001  {
8002  case FullMatrixType:
8003  {
8004  total_leaf_set.push_back(const_cast<HMatrix *>(this));
8005 
8006  break;
8007  }
8008  case RkMatrixType:
8009  {
8010  total_leaf_set.push_back(const_cast<HMatrix *>(this));
8011 
8012  break;
8013  }
8014  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
8015  {
8016  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
8017  {
8018  submatrix->_build_leaf_set(total_leaf_set);
8019  }
8020 
8021  break;
8022  }
8023  default:
8024  {
8025  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8026 
8027  break;
8028  }
8029  }
8030 }
8031 
8032 
8033 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8034 void
8035 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::
8036  distribute_all_non_leaf_nodes_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(
8037  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
8038 {
8042  if (submatrices.size() > 0)
8043  {
8048  Assert(type == HierarchicalMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8049 
8055  distribute_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(fixed_rank);
8056 
8062  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : submatrices)
8063  {
8064  Assert(submatrix, ExcInternalError());
8065 
8066  submatrix->distribute_all_non_leaf_nodes_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(
8067  fixed_rank);
8068  }
8069  }
8070 }
8071 
8072 
8073 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8074 void
8075 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::distribute_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(
8076  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
8077 {
8078  if (Sigma_R.size() > 0 || Sigma_F.size() > 0)
8079  {
8080  if (row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
8081  {
8082  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*row_indices,
8083  row_index_global_to_local_map);
8084  }
8085 
8086  if (col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
8087  {
8088  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*col_indices,
8089  col_index_global_to_local_map);
8090  }
8091 
8092  _distribute_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(*this, fixed_rank);
8093 
8094  for (auto &rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat : Sigma_R)
8095  {
8096  if (rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat != nullptr)
8097  {
8098  delete rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat;
8099  rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat = nullptr;
8100  }
8101  }
8102 
8103  Sigma_R.clear();
8104 
8105  for (auto &fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat : Sigma_F)
8106  {
8107  if (fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat != nullptr)
8108  {
8109  delete fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat;
8110  fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat = nullptr;
8111  }
8112  }
8113 
8114  Sigma_F.clear();
8115  }
8116 }
8117 
8118 
8119 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8120 void
8121 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::_distribute_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(
8122  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &starting_hmat,
8123  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
8124 {
8125  if (submatrices.size() > 0)
8126  {
8127  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : submatrices)
8128  {
8129  submatrix->_distribute_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(starting_hmat,
8130  fixed_rank);
8131  }
8132  }
8133  else
8134  {
8135  switch (type)
8136  {
8137  case FullMatrixType:
8138  {
8143  for (RkMatrix<Number> *rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat :
8144  starting_hmat.Sigma_R)
8145  {
8146  Assert(rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat, ExcInternalError());
8147 
8148  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> fullmatrix_restricted;
8149 
8150  rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat->restrictToFullMatrix(
8151  *row_indices,
8152  *col_indices,
8153  starting_hmat.row_index_global_to_local_map,
8154  starting_hmat.col_index_global_to_local_map,
8155  fullmatrix_restricted);
8156 
8157  fullmatrix->add(fullmatrix_restricted);
8158  }
8159 
8164  for (LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat :
8165  starting_hmat.Sigma_F)
8166  {
8167  Assert(fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat, ExcInternalError());
8168 
8169  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> fullmatrix_restricted(
8170  *row_indices,
8171  *col_indices,
8172  *fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat,
8173  starting_hmat.row_index_global_to_local_map,
8174  starting_hmat.col_index_global_to_local_map);
8175 
8176  fullmatrix->add(fullmatrix_restricted);
8177  }
8178 
8179  break;
8180  }
8181  case RkMatrixType:
8182  {
8187  for (RkMatrix<Number> *rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat :
8188  starting_hmat.Sigma_R)
8189  {
8190  Assert(rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat, ExcInternalError());
8191 
8192  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix_restricted(
8193  *row_indices,
8194  *col_indices,
8195  *rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat,
8196  starting_hmat.row_index_global_to_local_map,
8197  starting_hmat.col_index_global_to_local_map);
8198 
8199  if (fixed_rank == 0)
8200  {
8201  rkmatrix->add(rkmatrix_restricted);
8202  }
8203  else
8204  {
8205  rkmatrix->add(rkmatrix_restricted, fixed_rank);
8206  }
8207  }
8208 
8213  for (LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat :
8214  starting_hmat.Sigma_F)
8215  {
8216  Assert(fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat, ExcInternalError());
8217 
8218  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix_restricted(
8219  *row_indices,
8220  *col_indices,
8221  *fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat,
8222  starting_hmat.row_index_global_to_local_map,
8223  starting_hmat.col_index_global_to_local_map);
8224 
8225  if (fixed_rank == 0)
8226  {
8227  rkmatrix->add(rkmatrix_restricted);
8228  }
8229  else
8230  {
8231  rkmatrix->add(rkmatrix_restricted, fixed_rank);
8232  }
8233  }
8234 
8235  break;
8236  }
8237  default:
8238  {
8239  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8240  break;
8241  }
8242  }
8243  }
8244 }
8245 
8246 
8247 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8248 void
8249 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::release()
8250 {
8251  if (rkmatrix != nullptr)
8252  {
8253  delete rkmatrix;
8254  rkmatrix = nullptr;
8255  }
8256 
8257  if (fullmatrix != nullptr)
8258  {
8259  delete fullmatrix;
8260  fullmatrix = nullptr;
8261  }
8262 
8263  for (auto submatrix : submatrices)
8264  {
8271  if (submatrix != nullptr)
8272  {
8273  delete submatrix;
8274  }
8275  }
8276 
8277  submatrices.clear();
8278  leaf_set.clear();
8279 
8280  type = UndefinedMatrixType;
8281  bc_node = nullptr;
8282  parent = nullptr;
8283  submatrix_index = submatrix_index_invalid;
8284  row_indices = nullptr;
8285  col_indices = nullptr;
8286  row_index_global_to_local_map.clear();
8287  col_index_global_to_local_map.clear();
8288  m = 0;
8289  n = 0;
8290 
8291  Sigma_P.clear();
8292 
8293  for (auto &r : Sigma_R)
8294  {
8295  if (r != nullptr)
8296  {
8297  delete r;
8298  r = nullptr;
8299  }
8300  }
8301  Sigma_R.clear();
8302 
8303  for (auto &f : Sigma_F)
8304  {
8305  if (f != nullptr)
8306  {
8307  delete f;
8308  f = nullptr;
8309  }
8310  }
8311  Sigma_F.clear();
8312 
8313  Tind.release();
8314 }
8315 
8316 
8317 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8318 void
8319 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::clear()
8320 {
8324  if (submatrices.size() > 0)
8325  {
8326  Assert(type == HierarchicalMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8327 
8328  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
8329  {
8330  submatrix->clear();
8331  }
8332  }
8333 
8337  clear_hmat_node();
8338 }
8339 
8340 
8341 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8342 void
8343 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::clear_hmat_node()
8344 {
8345  type = UndefinedMatrixType;
8346  submatrices.clear();
8347  parent = nullptr;
8348  submatrix_index = submatrix_index_invalid;
8349  leaf_set.clear();
8350  rkmatrix = nullptr;
8351  fullmatrix = nullptr;
8352  bc_node = nullptr;
8353  row_indices = nullptr;
8354  col_indices = nullptr;
8355  row_index_global_to_local_map.clear();
8356  col_index_global_to_local_map.clear();
8357  m = 0;
8358  n = 0;
8359  Sigma_P.clear();
8360  Sigma_R.clear();
8361  Sigma_F.clear();
8362  Tind.clear();
8363 }
8364 
8365 
8366 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8367 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::~HMatrix()
8368 {
8369  release();
8370 }
8371 
8372 
8373 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8374 HMatrixType
8375 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_type() const
8376 {
8377  return type;
8378 }
8379 
8380 
8381 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8382 typename HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::size_type
8383 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_m() const
8384 {
8385  return m;
8386 }
8387 
8388 
8389 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8390 typename HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::size_type
8391 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_n() const
8392 {
8393  return n;
8394 }
8395 
8396 
8397 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8398 RkMatrix<Number> *
8399 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_rkmatrix()
8400 {
8401  return rkmatrix;
8402 }
8403 
8404 
8405 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8406 const RkMatrix<Number> *
8407 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_rkmatrix() const
8408 {
8409  return rkmatrix;
8410 }
8411 
8412 
8413 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8414 void
8415 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::calc_rank_upper_bound_for_rkmatrices() const
8416 {
8417  switch (type)
8418  {
8419  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
8420  {
8421  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
8422  {
8423  submatrix->calc_rank_upper_bound_for_rkmatrices();
8424  }
8425  }
8426 
8427  break;
8428  case RkMatrixType:
8429  {
8430  this->rkmatrix->calc_rank_upper_bound();
8431  }
8432 
8433  break;
8434  default: // Do nothing.
8435  {
8436  break;
8437  }
8438  }
8439 }
8440 
8441 
8442 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8443 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *
8444 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_fullmatrix()
8445 {
8446  return fullmatrix;
8447 }
8448 
8449 
8450 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8451 const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *
8452 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_fullmatrix() const
8453 {
8454  return fullmatrix;
8455 }
8456 
8457 
8458 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8459 std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *> &
8460 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_submatrices()
8461 {
8462  return submatrices;
8463 }
8464 
8465 
8466 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8467 const std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *> &
8468 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_submatrices() const
8469 {
8470  return submatrices;
8471 }
8472 
8473 
8474 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8475 void
8476 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::print_formatted(std::ostream & out,
8477  const unsigned int precision,
8478  const bool scientific,
8479  const unsigned int width,
8480  const char * zero_string,
8481  const double denominator,
8482  const double threshold) const
8483 {
8484  switch (type)
8485  {
8486  case FullMatrixType:
8487  fullmatrix->print_formatted(out,
8488  precision,
8489  scientific,
8490  width,
8491  zero_string,
8492  denominator,
8493  threshold);
8494 
8495  break;
8496  case RkMatrixType:
8497  rkmatrix->print_formatted(out,
8498  precision,
8499  scientific,
8500  width,
8501  zero_string,
8502  denominator,
8503  threshold);
8504 
8505  break;
8506  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
8507  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
8508  {
8509  submatrix->print_formatted(out,
8510  precision,
8511  scientific,
8512  width,
8513  zero_string,
8514  denominator,
8515  threshold);
8516  }
8517 
8518  break;
8519  case UndefinedMatrixType:
8520  default:
8521  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8522  break;
8523  }
8524 }
8525 
8526 
8527 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8528 void
8529 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::print_matrix_info(std::ostream &out) const
8530 {
8531  print_current_matrix_info(out);
8532 
8533  for (const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : submatrices)
8534  {
8535  submatrix->print_matrix_info(out);
8536  }
8537 }
8538 
8539 
8540 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8541 void
8542 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::print_current_matrix_info(std::ostream &out) const
8543 {
8544  out << "H-matrix address: " << std::hex << this << "\n";
8545  out << "Parent H-matrix address: " << std::hex << this->parent << "\n";
8546  out << "Submatrix addresses: (";
8547  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
8548  {
8549  out << std::hex << submatrices.at(i);
8550 
8551  if (i < submatrices.size() - 1)
8552  {
8553  out << ",";
8554  }
8555  }
8556  out << ")\n";
8557  out << "Submatrix index wrt. the parent H-matrix: " << std::dec
8558  << this->submatrix_index << std::endl;
8559 
8563  print_h_submatrix_accessor(std::cout, "M", *this);
8564  out << std::endl;
8565  out << "(#level, #Sigma_b^P, #Sigma_b^R, #Sigma_b^F)=("
8566  << bc_node->get_level() << "," << Sigma_P.size() << "," << Sigma_R.size()
8567  << "," << Sigma_F.size() << ")" << std::endl;
8568 
8569  for (std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
8570  hmat_pair : Sigma_P)
8571  {
8572  out << " Sigma_P products: ";
8573  print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(
8574  std::cout, "M1", *(hmat_pair.first), "M2", *(hmat_pair.second));
8575  }
8576 }
8577 
8578 
8579 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8580 void
8581 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::print_matrix_info_as_dot(std::ostream &out) const
8582 {
8586  out << "#@startdot\n";
8587  out << "digraph hmatrix {\n";
8588 
8592  out << "node [style=filled, shape=box]\n";
8593 
8597  out << "\"Non-leaf block\" [fillcolor=white]\n";
8598  out << "\"Near field block\" [fillcolor=red]\n";
8599  out << "\"Far field block\" [fillcolor=green]\n";
8600 
8601  _print_matrix_info_as_dot_node(out);
8602 
8606  out << "}\n";
8607  out << "#@enddot" << std::endl;
8608 }
8609 
8610 
8611 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8612 void
8613 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::_print_matrix_info_as_dot_node(
8614  std::ostream &out) const
8615 {
8621  out << "\"" << std::hex << this << "\""
8622  << "[label=<<b>" << std::hex << this << "</b><br/>" << std::dec
8623  << "tau: [";
8624  print_vector_values(out, *row_indices, ",", false);
8625  out << "]<br/>sigma: [";
8626  print_vector_values(out, *col_indices, ",", false);
8627  out << "]<br/>Level: " << bc_node->get_level() << "<br/>";
8628  out << "Parent: " << std::hex << parent << "<br/>";
8629  out << "Submatrix index: " << std::dec << submatrix_index << ">,";
8630 
8631  std::string node_color;
8632 
8633  if (type == FullMatrixType)
8634  {
8635  node_color = "red";
8636  }
8637  else if (type == RkMatrixType)
8638  {
8639  node_color = "green";
8640  }
8641  else
8642  {
8643  node_color = "white";
8644  }
8645  out << "fillcolor = " << node_color << "]\n\n";
8646 
8650  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : submatrices)
8651  {
8652  Assert(submatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
8653 
8654  out << "\"" << std::hex << this << "\""
8655  << "->"
8656  << "\"" << std::hex << submatrix << "\"\n";
8657  }
8658  out << "\n";
8659 
8663  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : submatrices)
8664  {
8665  Assert(submatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
8666 
8667  submatrix->_print_matrix_info_as_dot_node(out);
8668  }
8669 }
8670 
8671 
8672 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8673 void
8674 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::write_fullmatrix_leaf_node(
8675  std::ostream &out,
8676  const Number singular_value_threshold) const
8677 {
8678  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8679 
8680  const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &tau_index_set =
8681  bc_node->get_data_reference()
8682  .get_tau_node()
8683  ->get_data_reference()
8684  .get_index_set();
8685  const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &sigma_index_set =
8686  bc_node->get_data_reference()
8687  .get_sigma_node()
8688  ->get_data_reference()
8689  .get_index_set();
8690 
8694  out << "[";
8695  print_vector_values(out, tau_index_set, " ", false);
8696  out << "],";
8697 
8701  out << "[";
8702  print_vector_values(out, sigma_index_set, " ", false);
8703  out << "],";
8704 
8708  out << (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field() ? 1 : 0) << ",";
8709 
8714  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> copy(*fullmatrix);
8715  const size_t rank = copy.rank(singular_value_threshold);
8716 
8720  out << rank << "\n";
8721 }
8722 
8723 
8724 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8725 void
8726 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::write_rkmatrix_leaf_node(std::ostream &out) const
8727 {
8728  Assert(type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8729 
8730  const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &tau_index_set =
8731  bc_node->get_data_reference()
8732  .get_tau_node()
8733  ->get_data_reference()
8734  .get_index_set();
8735  const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &sigma_index_set =
8736  bc_node->get_data_reference()
8737  .get_sigma_node()
8738  ->get_data_reference()
8739  .get_index_set();
8740 
8744  out << "[";
8745  print_vector_values(out, tau_index_set, " ", false);
8746  out << "],";
8747 
8751  out << "[";
8752  print_vector_values(out, sigma_index_set, " ", false);
8753  out << "],";
8754 
8758  out << (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field() ? 1 : 0) << ",";
8759 
8763  out << rkmatrix->get_rank() << "\n";
8764 
8765  // DEBUG: Print out the rkmatrix.
8766  rkmatrix->print_formatted(out, 8, false, 16, "0");
8767 }
8768 
8769 
8770 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8771 void
8772 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::write_leaf_set(
8773  std::ostream &out,
8774  const Number singular_value_threshold) const
8775 {
8776  switch (type)
8777  {
8778  case FullMatrixType:
8779  {
8780  write_fullmatrix_leaf_node(out, singular_value_threshold);
8781 
8782  break;
8783  }
8784  case RkMatrixType:
8785  {
8786  write_rkmatrix_leaf_node(out);
8787 
8788  break;
8789  }
8790  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
8791  {
8792  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
8793  {
8794  submatrix->write_leaf_set(out);
8795  }
8796 
8797  break;
8798  }
8799  default:
8800  {
8801  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8802 
8803  break;
8804  }
8805  }
8806 }
8807 
8808 
8809 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8810 void
8811 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::write_leaf_set_by_iteration(
8812  std::ostream &out,
8813  const Number singular_value_threshold) const
8814 {
8815  for (HMatrix *leaf_node : leaf_set)
8816  {
8817  switch (leaf_node->type)
8818  {
8819  case FullMatrixType:
8820  {
8821  leaf_node->write_fullmatrix_leaf_node(out,
8822  singular_value_threshold);
8823 
8824  break;
8825  }
8826  case RkMatrixType:
8827  {
8828  leaf_node->write_rkmatrix_leaf_node(out);
8829 
8830  break;
8831  }
8832  default:
8833  {
8834  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8835 
8836  break;
8837  }
8838  }
8839  }
8840 }
8841 
8842 
8843 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8844 HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *
8845 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::find_row_diag_block_for_offdiag_block()
8846 {
8851  Assert(
8852  parent != nullptr,
8853  ExcMessage(
8854  "The current H-matrix node, the diagonal block of which on a same row is to be found, should not be on the top level!"));
8855 
8875  std::vector<unsigned int> submatrix_index_stack;
8876  submatrix_index_stack.reserve(this->bc_node->get_level());
8877 
8878  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *current_hmat_during_recursion = this;
8879  bool is_recursion_continued = true;
8880  while (is_recursion_continued)
8881  {
8882  if (current_hmat_during_recursion->parent == nullptr)
8883  {
8888  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
8889  is_recursion_continued = false;
8890  }
8891  else
8892  {
8893  switch (current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index)
8894  {
8895  case 1:
8896  {
8912  if (current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[0]
8913  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
8914  .get_tau_node() ==
8915  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[0]
8916  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
8917  .get_sigma_node())
8918  {
8919  current_hmat_during_recursion =
8920  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[0];
8921  is_recursion_continued = false;
8922  }
8923  else
8924  {
8928  submatrix_index_stack.push_back(
8929  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index);
8930  current_hmat_during_recursion =
8931  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent;
8932  }
8933 
8934  break;
8935  }
8936  case 2:
8937  {
8945  if (current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[3]
8946  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
8947  .get_tau_node() ==
8948  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[3]
8949  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
8950  .get_sigma_node())
8951  {
8952  current_hmat_during_recursion =
8953  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[3];
8954  is_recursion_continued = false;
8955  }
8956  else
8957  {
8961  submatrix_index_stack.push_back(
8962  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index);
8963  current_hmat_during_recursion =
8964  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent;
8965  }
8966 
8967  break;
8968  }
8969  default:
8970  {
8974  submatrix_index_stack.push_back(
8975  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index);
8976  current_hmat_during_recursion =
8977  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent;
8978 
8979  break;
8980  }
8981  }
8982  }
8983  }
8984 
8985  const unsigned int iter_num = submatrix_index_stack.size();
8986  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < iter_num; i++)
8987  {
8988  switch (submatrix_index_stack.back())
8989  {
8990  case 0:
8991  case 1:
8992  {
8993  current_hmat_during_recursion =
8994  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrices[0];
8995 
8996  break;
8997  }
8998  case 2:
8999  case 3:
9000  {
9001  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9002  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrices[3];
9003 
9004  break;
9005  }
9006  }
9007 
9008  submatrix_index_stack.pop_back();
9009  }
9010 
9011  return current_hmat_during_recursion;
9012 }
9013 
9014 
9015 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9016 HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *
9017 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::find_col_diag_block_for_offdiag_block()
9018 {
9023  Assert(
9024  parent != nullptr,
9025  ExcMessage(
9026  "The current H-matrix node, the diagonal block of which on a same row is to be found, should not be on the top level!"));
9027 
9047  std::vector<unsigned int> submatrix_index_stack;
9048  submatrix_index_stack.reserve(this->bc_node->get_level());
9049 
9050  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *current_hmat_during_recursion = this;
9051  bool is_recursion_continued = true;
9052  while (is_recursion_continued)
9053  {
9054  if (current_hmat_during_recursion->parent == nullptr)
9055  {
9061  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
9062  is_recursion_continued = false;
9063  }
9064  else
9065  {
9066  switch (current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index)
9067  {
9068  case 1:
9069  {
9084  if (current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[3]
9085  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
9086  .get_tau_node() ==
9087  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[3]
9088  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
9089  .get_sigma_node())
9090  {
9091  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9092  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[3];
9093  is_recursion_continued = false;
9094  }
9095  else
9096  {
9100  submatrix_index_stack.push_back(
9101  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index);
9102  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9103  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent;
9104  }
9105 
9106  break;
9107  }
9108  case 2:
9109  {
9117  if (current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[0]
9118  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
9119  .get_tau_node() ==
9120  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[0]
9121  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
9122  .get_sigma_node())
9123  {
9124  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9125  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[0];
9126  is_recursion_continued = false;
9127  }
9128  else
9129  {
9133  submatrix_index_stack.push_back(
9134  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index);
9135  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9136  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent;
9137  }
9138 
9139  break;
9140  }
9141  default:
9142  {
9146  submatrix_index_stack.push_back(
9147  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index);
9148  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9149  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent;
9150 
9151  break;
9152  }
9153  }
9154  }
9155  }
9156 
9157  const unsigned int iter_num = submatrix_index_stack.size();
9158  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < iter_num; i++)
9159  {
9160  switch (submatrix_index_stack.back())
9161  {
9162  case 0:
9163  case 2:
9164  {
9165  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9166  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrices[0];
9167 
9168  break;
9169  }
9170  case 1:
9171  case 3:
9172  {
9173  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9174  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrices[3];
9175 
9176  break;
9177  }
9178  }
9179 
9180  submatrix_index_stack.pop_back();
9181  }
9182 
9183  return current_hmat_during_recursion;
9184 }
9185 
9186 
9187 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9188 void
9189 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::truncate_to_rank(size_type new_rank)
9190 {
9191  switch (type)
9192  {
9193  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9194  {
9195  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9196  {
9197  submatrix->truncate_to_rank(new_rank);
9198  }
9199 
9200  break;
9201  }
9202  case FullMatrixType:
9203  {
9208  break;
9209  }
9210  case RkMatrixType:
9211  {
9215  rkmatrix->truncate_to_rank(new_rank);
9216 
9217  break;
9218  }
9219  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9220  default:
9221  {
9222  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9223  break;
9224  }
9225  }
9226 }
9227 
9228 
9229 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9230 void
9231 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::truncate_to_rank_diag_preserve_positive_definite(
9232  size_type new_rank)
9233 {
9238  Assert(type == HierarchicalMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9239  AssertDimension(submatrices.size(), 4);
9240 
9244  switch (submatrices.at(0)->type)
9245  {
9246  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9247  {
9248  submatrices.at(0)->truncate_to_rank_diag_preserve_positive_definite(
9249  new_rank);
9250 
9251  break;
9252  }
9253  case FullMatrixType:
9254  {
9258  break;
9259  }
9260  case RkMatrixType:
9261  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9262  {
9263  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9264  break;
9265  }
9266  }
9267 
9268  switch (submatrices.at(2)->type)
9269  {
9270  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9271  {
9272  submatrices.at(2)
9273  ->truncate_to_rank_off_diag_preserve_positive_definite(new_rank);
9274 
9275  break;
9276  }
9277  case RkMatrixType:
9278  {
9279  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<double> C, D;
9280  submatrices.at(2)->rkmatrix->truncate_to_rank(new_rank, D, C);
9281 
9282  break;
9283  }
9284  case FullMatrixType:
9285  {
9289  break;
9290  }
9291  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9292  {
9293  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9294  break;
9295  }
9296  }
9297 
9298  switch (submatrices.at(3)->type)
9299  {
9300  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9301  {
9302  submatrices.at(3)->truncate_to_rank_diag_preserve_positive_definite(
9303  new_rank);
9304 
9305  break;
9306  }
9307  case FullMatrixType:
9308  {
9312  break;
9313  }
9314  case RkMatrixType:
9315  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9316  {
9317  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9318  break;
9319  }
9320  }
9321 }
9322 
9323 
9324 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9325 void
9326 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::truncate_to_rank_off_diag_preserve_positive_definite(
9327  size_type new_rank)
9328 {
9333  Assert(type == HierarchicalMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9334  AssertDimension(submatrices.size(), 4);
9335 
9339  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9340  {
9341  switch (submatrix->type)
9342  {
9343  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9344  {
9345  submatrix->truncate_to_rank_off_diag_preserve_positive_definite(
9346  new_rank);
9347 
9348  break;
9349  }
9350  case FullMatrixType:
9351  {
9355  break;
9356  }
9357  case RkMatrixType:
9358  {
9359  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<double> C, D;
9360  submatrix->rkmatrix->truncate_to_rank(new_rank, D, C);
9361 
9362  break;
9363  }
9364  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9365  {
9366  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9367  break;
9368  }
9369  }
9370  }
9371 }
9372 
9373 
9374 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9375 void
9376 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::vmult(Vector<Number> & y,
9377  const Vector<Number> &x) const
9378 {
9379  switch (type)
9380  {
9381  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9382  {
9383  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9384  {
9385  submatrix->vmult(y, x);
9386  }
9387 
9388  break;
9389  }
9390  case FullMatrixType:
9391  {
9392  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9393  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9394 
9398  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9399  {
9400  local_x(j) = x(col_indices->at(j));
9401  }
9402 
9403  fullmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9404 
9408  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9409  {
9410  y(row_indices->at(i)) += local_y(i);
9411  }
9412 
9413  break;
9414  }
9415  case RkMatrixType:
9416  {
9417  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9418  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9419 
9423  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9424  {
9425  local_x(j) = x(col_indices->at(j));
9426  }
9427 
9428  rkmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9429 
9433  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9434  {
9435  y(row_indices->at(i)) += local_y(i);
9436  }
9437 
9438  break;
9439  }
9440  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9441  default:
9442  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9443  }
9444 }
9445 
9446 
9447 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9448 void
9449 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::vmult(Vector<Number> & y,
9450  const Number alpha,
9451  const Vector<Number> &x) const
9452 {
9453  switch (type)
9454  {
9455  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9456  {
9457  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9458  {
9459  submatrix->vmult(y, alpha, x);
9460  }
9461 
9462  break;
9463  }
9464  case FullMatrixType:
9465  {
9466  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9467  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9468 
9472  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9473  {
9474  local_x(j) = x(col_indices->at(j));
9475  }
9476 
9477  fullmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9478 
9482  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9483  {
9484  y(row_indices->at(i)) += alpha * local_y(i);
9485  }
9486 
9487  break;
9488  }
9489  case RkMatrixType:
9490  {
9491  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9492  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9493 
9497  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9498  {
9499  local_x(j) = x(col_indices->at(j));
9500  }
9501 
9502  rkmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9503 
9507  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9508  {
9509  y(row_indices->at(i)) += alpha * local_y(i);
9510  }
9511 
9512  break;
9513  }
9514  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9515  default:
9516  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9517  }
9518 }
9519 
9520 
9521 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9522 void
9523 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::vmult(
9524  Vector<Number> & y,
9525  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &y_index_global_to_local_map,
9526  const Vector<Number> & x,
9527  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &x_index_global_to_local_map)
9528  const
9529 {
9530  switch (type)
9531  {
9532  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9533  {
9534  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9535  {
9536  submatrix->vmult(y,
9537  y_index_global_to_local_map,
9538  x,
9539  x_index_global_to_local_map);
9540  }
9541 
9542  break;
9543  }
9544  case FullMatrixType:
9545  {
9546  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9547  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9548 
9552  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9553  {
9554  local_x(j) =
9555  x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j)));
9556  }
9557 
9558  fullmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9559 
9563  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9564  {
9565  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i))) +=
9566  local_y(i);
9567  }
9568 
9569  break;
9570  }
9571  case RkMatrixType:
9572  {
9573  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9574  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9575 
9579  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9580  {
9581  local_x(j) =
9582  x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j)));
9583  }
9584 
9585  rkmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9586 
9590  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9591  {
9592  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i))) +=
9593  local_y(i);
9594  }
9595 
9596  break;
9597  }
9598  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9599  default:
9600  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9601  }
9602 }
9603 
9604 
9605 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9606 void
9607 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::vmult(
9608  Vector<Number> & y,
9609  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &y_index_global_to_local_map,
9610  const Number alpha,
9611  const Vector<Number> & x,
9612  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &x_index_global_to_local_map)
9613  const
9614 {
9615  switch (type)
9616  {
9617  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9618  {
9619  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9620  {
9621  submatrix->vmult(y,
9622  y_index_global_to_local_map,
9623  alpha,
9624  x,
9625  x_index_global_to_local_map);
9626  }
9627 
9628  break;
9629  }
9630  case FullMatrixType:
9631  {
9632  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9633  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9634 
9638  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9639  {
9640  local_x(j) =
9641  x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j)));
9642  }
9643 
9644  fullmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9645 
9649  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9650  {
9651  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i))) +=
9652  alpha * local_y(i);
9653  }
9654 
9655  break;
9656  }
9657  case RkMatrixType:
9658  {
9659  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9660  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9661 
9665  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9666  {
9667  local_x(j) =
9668  x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j)));
9669  }
9670 
9671  rkmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9672 
9676  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9677  {
9678  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i))) +=
9679  alpha * local_y(i);
9680  }
9681 
9682  break;
9683  }
9684  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9685  default:
9686  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9687  }
9688 }
9689 
9690 
9691 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9692 void
9693 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::Tvmult(Vector<Number> & y,
9694  const Vector<Number> &x) const
9695 {
9696  Vector<Number> local_y(n);
9697  Vector<Number> local_x(m);
9698 
9699  switch (type)
9700  {
9701  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9702  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9703  {
9704  submatrix->Tvmult(y, x);
9705  }
9706 
9707  break;
9708  case FullMatrixType:
9712  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
9713  {
9714  local_x(j) = x(row_indices->at(j));
9715  }
9716 
9717  fullmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
9718 
9722  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
9723  {
9724  y(col_indices->at(i)) += local_y(i);
9725  }
9726 
9727  break;
9728  case RkMatrixType:
9732  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
9733  {
9734  local_x(j) = x(row_indices->at(j));
9735  }
9736 
9737  rkmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
9738 
9742  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
9743  {
9744  y(col_indices->at(i)) += local_y(i);
9745  }
9746 
9747  break;
9748  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9749  default:
9750  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9751  }
9752 }
9753 
9754 
9755 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9756 void
9757 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::Tvmult(Vector<Number> & y,
9758  const Number alpha,
9759  const Vector<Number> &x) const
9760 {
9761  Vector<Number> local_y(n);
9762  Vector<Number> local_x(m);
9763 
9764  switch (type)
9765  {
9766  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9767  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9768  {
9769  submatrix->Tvmult(y, alpha, x);
9770  }
9771 
9772  break;
9773  case FullMatrixType:
9777  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
9778  {
9779  local_x(j) = x(row_indices->at(j));
9780  }
9781 
9782  fullmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
9783 
9787  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
9788  {
9789  y(col_indices->at(i)) += alpha * local_y(i);
9790  }
9791 
9792  break;
9793  case RkMatrixType:
9797  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
9798  {
9799  local_x(j) = x(row_indices->at(j));
9800  }
9801 
9802  rkmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
9803 
9807  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
9808  {
9809  y(col_indices->at(i)) += alpha * local_y(i);
9810  }
9811 
9812  break;
9813  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9814  default:
9815  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9816  }
9817 }
9818 
9819 
9820 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9821 void
9822 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::Tvmult(
9823  Vector<Number> & y,
9824  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &y_index_global_to_local_map,
9825  const Vector<Number> & x,
9826  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &x_index_global_to_local_map)
9827  const
9828 {
9829  Vector<Number> local_y(n);
9830  Vector<Number> local_x(m);
9831 
9832  switch (type)
9833  {
9834  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9835  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9836  {
9837  submatrix->Tvmult(y,
9838  y_index_global_to_local_map,
9839  x,
9840  x_index_global_to_local_map);
9841  }
9842 
9843  break;
9844  case FullMatrixType:
9848  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
9849  {
9850  local_x(j) = x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(j)));
9851  }
9852 
9853  fullmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
9854 
9858  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
9859  {
9860  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(i))) += local_y(i);
9861  }
9862 
9863  break;
9864  case RkMatrixType:
9868  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
9869  {
9870  local_x(j) = x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(j)));
9871  }
9872 
9873  rkmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
9874 
9878  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
9879  {
9880  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(i))) += local_y(i);
9881  }
9882 
9883  break;
9884  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9885  default:
9886  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9887  }
9888 }
9889 
9890 
9891 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9892 void
9893 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::Tvmult(
9894  Vector<Number> & y,
9895  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &y_index_global_to_local_map,
9896  const Number alpha,
9897  const Vector<Number> & x,
9898  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &x_index_global_to_local_map)
9899  const
9900 {
9901  Vector<Number> local_y(n);
9902  Vector<Number> local_x(m);
9903 
9904  switch (type)
9905  {
9906  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9907  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9908  {
9909  submatrix->Tvmult(y,
9910  y_index_global_to_local_map,
9911  alpha,
9912  x,
9913  x_index_global_to_local_map);
9914  }
9915 
9916  break;
9917  case FullMatrixType:
9921  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
9922  {
9923  local_x(j) = x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(j)));
9924  }
9925 
9926  fullmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
9927 
9931  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
9932  {
9933  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(i))) +=
9934  alpha * local_y(i);
9935  }
9936 
9937  break;
9938  case RkMatrixType:
9942  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
9943  {
9944  local_x(j) = x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(j)));
9945  }
9946 
9947  rkmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
9948 
9952  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
9953  {
9954  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(i))) +=
9955  alpha * local_y(i);
9956  }
9957 
9958  break;
9959  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9960  default:
9961  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9962  }
9963 }
9964 
9965 
9966 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9967 void
9968 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::h_h_mmult_reduction()
9969 {
9970  std::vector<
9971  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>>
9972  Sigma_P_cannot_reduced;
9973 
9974  while (Sigma_P.size() > 0)
9975  {
9976  // Get the last element in the list.
9977  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
9978  & hmat_pair = Sigma_P.back();
9979  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M1 = hmat_pair.first;
9980  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M2 = hmat_pair.second;
9981 
9986  if (M1->type == RkMatrixType)
9987  {
9988  rk_h_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(M1, M2, this);
9989  }
9990  else if (M2->type == RkMatrixType)
9991  {
9992  h_rk_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(M1, M2, this);
9993  }
9994  else if (M1->type == FullMatrixType)
9995  {
9996  f_h_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(M1, M2, this);
9997  }
9998  else if (M2->type == FullMatrixType)
9999  {
10000  h_f_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(M1, M2, this);
10001  }
10002  else if (M1->bc_node->get_split_mode() == VerticalSplitMode &&
10003  M2->bc_node->get_split_mode() == HorizontalSplitMode)
10004  {
10005  // Internal splitting
10006  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10007 
10008  Assert(M1->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10009  Assert(M2->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10010  Sigma_P.push_back(
10011  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10012  M1->submatrices[0], M2->submatrices[0]));
10013 
10014  Assert(M1->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10015  Assert(M2->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10016  Sigma_P.push_back(
10017  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10018  M1->submatrices[1], M2->submatrices[1]));
10019  }
10020  else
10021  {
10026  Sigma_P_cannot_reduced.push_back(hmat_pair);
10031  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10032  }
10033  }
10034 
10039  for (std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
10040  hmat_pair : Sigma_P_cannot_reduced)
10041  {
10042  Sigma_P.push_back(hmat_pair);
10043  }
10044 }
10045 
10046 
10047 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10048 void
10049 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::h_h_mmult_horizontal_split(
10050  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bc_tree)
10051 {
10055  split_block_cluster_node(bc_node, bc_tree, HorizontalSplitMode);
10056 
10057  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat0 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10058  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat0, bc_node->get_child_pointer(0));
10063  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat0);
10064 
10065  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat1 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10066  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat1, bc_node->get_child_pointer(1));
10071  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat1);
10072 
10076  while (Sigma_P.size() > 0)
10077  {
10078  // Get the last element in the list.
10079  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
10080  &hmat_pair = Sigma_P.back();
10081 
10086  if (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == HorizontalSplitMode &&
10087  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == UnsplitMode)
10088  {
10089  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10090  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10091  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10092  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0], hmat_pair.second));
10093 
10094  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10095  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10096  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10097  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1], hmat_pair.second));
10098 
10103  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10104  }
10105  else if (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode &&
10106  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
10107  HorizontalSplitMode)
10108  {
10109  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10110  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10111  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10112  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10113  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10114  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10115 
10116  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10117  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10118  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10119  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10120  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10121  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10122 
10123  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[2], ExcInternalError());
10124  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10125  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10126  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[2],
10127  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10128 
10129  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[3], ExcInternalError());
10130  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10131  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10132  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[3],
10133  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10134 
10139  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10140  }
10141  else
10142  {
10143  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
10144  }
10145  }
10146 
10151  type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
10152 }
10153 
10154 
10155 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10156 void
10157 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::h_h_mmult_vertical_split(
10158  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bc_tree)
10159 {
10163  split_block_cluster_node(bc_node, bc_tree, VerticalSplitMode);
10164 
10165  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat0 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10166  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat0, bc_node->get_child_pointer(0));
10171  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat0);
10172 
10173  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat1 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10174  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat1, bc_node->get_child_pointer(1));
10179  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat1);
10180 
10184  while (Sigma_P.size() > 0)
10185  {
10186  // Get the last element in the list.
10187  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
10188  &hmat_pair = Sigma_P.back();
10189 
10194  if (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == UnsplitMode &&
10195  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == VerticalSplitMode)
10196  {
10197  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10198  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10199  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10200  hmat_pair.first, hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10201 
10202  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10203  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10204  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10205  hmat_pair.first, hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10206 
10211  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10212  }
10213  else if (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
10214  VerticalSplitMode &&
10215  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode)
10216  {
10217  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10218  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10219  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10220  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10221  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10222  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10223 
10224  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10225  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[2], ExcInternalError());
10226  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10227  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10228  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10229  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[2]));
10230 
10231  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10232  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10233  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10234  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10235  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10236 
10237  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[3], ExcInternalError());
10238  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10239  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10240  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10241  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[3]));
10242 
10247  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10248  }
10249  else
10250  {
10251  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
10252  }
10253  }
10254 
10259  type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
10260 }
10261 
10262 
10263 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10264 void
10265 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::h_h_mmult_cross_split(
10266  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bc_tree)
10267 {
10271  split_block_cluster_node(bc_node, bc_tree, CrossSplitMode);
10272 
10273  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat0 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10274  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat0, bc_node->get_child_pointer(0));
10279  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat0);
10280 
10281  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat1 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10282  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat1, bc_node->get_child_pointer(1));
10287  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat1);
10288 
10289  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat2 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10290  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat2, bc_node->get_child_pointer(2));
10295  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat2);
10296 
10297  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat3 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10298  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat3, bc_node->get_child_pointer(3));
10303  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat3);
10304 
10308  while (Sigma_P.size() > 0)
10309  {
10310  // Get the last element in the list.
10311  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
10312  &hmat_pair = Sigma_P.back();
10313 
10318  if (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode &&
10319  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode)
10320  {
10326  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10327  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10328  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10329  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10330  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10331  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10332 
10333  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10334  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[2], ExcInternalError());
10335  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10336  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10337  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10338  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[2]));
10339 
10345  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10346  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10347  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10348  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10349  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10350 
10351  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[3], ExcInternalError());
10352  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10353  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10354  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10355  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[3]));
10356 
10362  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[2], ExcInternalError());
10363  child_hmat2->Sigma_P.push_back(
10364  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10365  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[2],
10366  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10367 
10368  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[3], ExcInternalError());
10369  child_hmat2->Sigma_P.push_back(
10370  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10371  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[3],
10372  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[2]));
10373 
10379  child_hmat3->Sigma_P.push_back(
10380  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10381  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[2],
10382  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10383 
10384  child_hmat3->Sigma_P.push_back(
10385  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10386  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[3],
10387  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[3]));
10388 
10393  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10394  }
10395  else if (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
10396  HorizontalSplitMode &&
10397  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == VerticalSplitMode)
10398  {
10399  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10400  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10401  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10402  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10403  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10404  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10405 
10406  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10407  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10408  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10409  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10410  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10411 
10412  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10413  child_hmat2->Sigma_P.push_back(
10414  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10415  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10416  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10417 
10418  child_hmat3->Sigma_P.push_back(
10419  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10420  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10421  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10422 
10427  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10428  }
10429  else
10430  {
10431  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
10432  }
10433  }
10434 
10439  type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
10440 }
10441 
10442 
10443 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10444 void
10445 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::mmult(
10446  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & C,
10447  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & B,
10448  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct_a,
10449  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct_b,
10450  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> & bct_c,
10451  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
10452 {
10463  C.release();
10464 
10469  C.Tind = BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>(
10470  bct_a.get_root()->get_data_reference().get_tau_node(),
10471  bct_b.get_root()->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node(),
10472  bct_c.get_n_min());
10473 
10477  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
10478  initial_hmat_pair(this, &B);
10479  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(C, C.Tind.get_root(), initial_hmat_pair);
10484  h_h_mmult_phase1_recursion(&C, C.Tind);
10485 
10491  C.Tind.build_leaf_set();
10492  C.Tind.categorize_near_and_far_field_sets();
10493  C.Tind.calc_depth_and_max_level();
10494 
10498  std::ofstream out1("Tind_after_phase1.dat");
10499  C.Tind.write_leaf_set(out1);
10500  out1.close();
10501 
10505  C.build_leaf_set();
10506 
10507  // // DEBUG
10508  // std::cout << "=== Product matrix info before phase 2 ===" << std::endl;
10509  // C.print_matrix_info(std::cout);
10510 
10511  h_h_mmult_phase2(C, bct_c, fixed_rank);
10512 
10513  // // DEBUG
10514  // std::cout << "=== Product matrix info after phase 2 ===" << std::endl;
10515  // C.print_matrix_info(std::cout);
10516 
10520  std::ofstream out2("Tind_after_phase2.dat");
10521  C.Tind.write_leaf_set(out2);
10522  out2.close();
10523 
10529 }
10530 
10531 
10532 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10533 void
10534 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::mmult(
10535  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & C,
10536  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & B,
10537  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct_a,
10538  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct_b,
10539  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> & bct_c,
10540  const unsigned int fixed_rank,
10541  const bool adding)
10542 {
10543  if (adding)
10544  {
10545  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> C_prime;
10546  mmult(C_prime, B, bct_a, bct_b, bct_c, fixed_rank);
10547  C.add(C_prime, fixed_rank);
10548  }
10549  else
10550  {
10551  mmult(C, B, bct_a, bct_b, bct_c, fixed_rank);
10552  }
10553 }
10554

10557 void
10558 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::mmult_level_conserving(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &C,
10559  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10560  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
10561 {
10562  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(C, C, (*this), B, fixed_rank);
10563 }

10566 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10567 void
10568 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::mmult_level_conserving(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &C,
10569  const Number alpha,
10570  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10571  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
10572 {
10573  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(C, C, alpha, (*this), B, fixed_rank);
10574 }

10578 void
10579 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::mTmult_level_conserving(
10580  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &C,

10589 void
10590 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::mTmult_level_conserving(
10591  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &C,
10592  const Number alpha,
10593  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10594  const unsigned int fixed_rank)

10598 
10599 
10600 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10601 void
10602 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & C,
10603  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10604  const size_type fixed_rank_k) const
10605 {
10610  switch (type)
10611  {
10612  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
10613  {
10617  for (size_type i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
10618  {
10619  submatrices.at(i)->add(*(C.submatrices.at(i)),
10620  *(B.submatrices.at(i)),
10621  fixed_rank_k);
10622  }
10623 
10624  break;
10625  }
10626  case FullMatrixType:
10627  {
10631  this->fullmatrix->add(*(C.fullmatrix), *(B.fullmatrix));
10632 
10633  break;
10634  }
10635  case RkMatrixType:
10636  {
10640  this->rkmatrix->add(*(C.rkmatrix), *(B.rkmatrix), fixed_rank_k);
10641 
10642  break;
10643  }
10644  case UndefinedMatrixType:
10645  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
10646  break;
10647  }
10648 }
10649 
10650 
10651 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10652 void
10653 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & C,
10654  const Number b,
10655  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10656  const size_type fixed_rank_k) const
10657 {
10662  switch (type)
10663  {
10664  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
10665  {
10669  for (size_type i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
10670  {
10671  submatrices.at(i)->add(*(C.submatrices.at(i)),
10672  b,
10673  *(B.submatrices.at(i)),
10674  fixed_rank_k);
10675  }
10676 
10677  break;
10678  }
10679  case FullMatrixType:
10680  {
10684  this->fullmatrix->add(*(C.fullmatrix), b, *(B.fullmatrix));
10685 
10686  break;
10687  }
10688  case RkMatrixType:
10689  {
10693  this->rkmatrix->add(*(C.rkmatrix), b, *(B.rkmatrix), fixed_rank_k);
10694 
10695  break;
10696  }
10697  case UndefinedMatrixType:
10698  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
10699  break;
10700  }
10701 }
10702 
10703 
10704 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10705 void
10706 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10707  const size_type fixed_rank_k) const
10708 {
10713  switch (type)
10714  {
10715  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
10716  {
10720  for (size_type i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
10721  {
10722  submatrices.at(i)->add(*(B.submatrices.at(i)), fixed_rank_k);
10723  }
10724 
10725  break;
10726  }
10727  case FullMatrixType:
10728  {
10732  this->fullmatrix->add(*(B.fullmatrix));
10733 
10734  break;
10735  }
10736  case RkMatrixType:
10737  {
10741  this->rkmatrix->add(*(B.rkmatrix), fixed_rank_k);
10742 
10743  break;
10744  }
10745  case UndefinedMatrixType:
10746  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
10747  break;
10748  }
10749 }
10750 
10751 
10752 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10753 void
10754 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(const Number b,
10755  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10756  const size_type fixed_rank_k) const
10757 {
10762  switch (type)
10763  {
10764  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
10765  {
10769  for (size_type i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
10770  {
10771  submatrices.at(i)->add(b, *(B.submatrices.at(i)), fixed_rank_k);
10772  }
10773 
10774  break;
10775  }
10776  case FullMatrixType:
10777  {
10781  this->fullmatrix->add(b, *(B.fullmatrix));
10782 
10783  break;
10784  }
10785  case RkMatrixType:
10786  {
10790  this->rkmatrix->add(b, *(B.rkmatrix), fixed_rank_k);
10791 
10792  break;
10793  }
10794  case UndefinedMatrixType:
10795  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
10796  break;
10797  }
10798 }
10799 
10800 
10801 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10802 void
10803 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(const RkMatrix<Number> &B,
10804  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
10805  &row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10806  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
10807  &col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10808  const size_type fixed_rank_k) const
10809 {
10810  switch (type)
10811  {
10812  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
10813  {
10814  for (size_type i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
10815  {
10816  submatrices.at(i)->add(B,
10817  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10818  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10819  fixed_rank_k);
10820  }
10821 
10822  break;
10823  }
10824  case FullMatrixType:
10825  {
10830  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> fullmatrix_from_rk;
10831  B.restrictToFullMatrix(*(row_indices),
10832  *(col_indices),
10833  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10834  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10835  fullmatrix_from_rk);
10836  this->fullmatrix->add(fullmatrix_from_rk);
10837 
10838  break;
10839  }
10840  case RkMatrixType:
10841  {
10846  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix_by_restriction(
10847  *(row_indices),
10848  *(col_indices),
10849  B,
10850  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10851  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk);
10852 
10853  // // DEBUG
10854  // std::cout << "rkmatrix rank before addition: "
10855  // << this->rkmatrix->get_rank() << std::endl;
10856 
10857  this->rkmatrix->add(rkmatrix_by_restriction, fixed_rank_k);
10858 
10859  // // DEBUG
10860  // std::cout << "rkmatrix rank after addition: "
10861  // << this->rkmatrix->get_rank() << std::endl;
10862 
10863  break;
10864  }
10865  case UndefinedMatrixType:
10866  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
10867  break;
10868  }
10869 }
10870 
10871 
10872 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10873 void
10874 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(const Number b,
10875  const RkMatrix<Number> &B,
10876  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
10877  &row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10878  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
10879  &col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10880  const size_type fixed_rank_k) const
10881 {
10882  switch (type)
10883  {
10884  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
10885  {
10886  for (size_type i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
10887  {
10888  submatrices.at(i)->add(b,
10889  B,
10890  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10891  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10892  fixed_rank_k);
10893  }
10894 
10895  break;
10896  }
10897  case FullMatrixType:
10898  {
10903  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> fullmatrix_from_rk;
10904  B.restrictToFullMatrix(*(row_indices),
10905  *(col_indices),
10906  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10907  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10908  fullmatrix_from_rk);
10909  this->fullmatrix->add(b, fullmatrix_from_rk);
10910 
10911  break;
10912  }
10913  case RkMatrixType:
10914  {
10919  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix_by_restriction(
10920  *(row_indices),
10921  *(col_indices),
10922  B,
10923  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
10924  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk);
10925 
10926  // // DEBUG
10927  // std::cout << "rkmatrix rank before addition: "
10928  // << this->rkmatrix->get_rank() << std::endl;
10929 
10930  this->rkmatrix->add(b, rkmatrix_by_restriction, fixed_rank_k);
10931 
10932  // // DEBUG
10933  // std::cout << "rkmatrix rank after addition: "
10934  // << this->rkmatrix->get_rank() << std::endl;
10935 
10936  break;
10937  }
10938  case UndefinedMatrixType:
10939  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
10940  break;
10941  }
10942 }
10943 
10944 
10945 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10946 void
10947 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(const RkMatrix<Number> &B,
10948  const size_type fixed_rank_k)
10949 {
10950  AssertDimension(m, B.get_m());
10951  AssertDimension(n, B.get_n());
10952 
10953  if (row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
10954  {
10955  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(row_indices),
10956  row_index_global_to_local_map);
10957  }
10958 
10959  if (col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
10960  {
10961  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(col_indices),
10962  col_index_global_to_local_map);
10963  }
10964 
10965  this->add(B,
10966  row_index_global_to_local_map,
10967  col_index_global_to_local_map,
10968  fixed_rank_k);
10969 }
10970 
10971 
10972 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10973 void
10974 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(const Number b,
10975  const RkMatrix<Number> &B,
10976  const size_type fixed_rank_k)
10977 {
10978  AssertDimension(m, B.get_m());
10979  AssertDimension(n, B.get_n());
10980 
10981  if (row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
10982  {
10983  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(row_indices),
10984  row_index_global_to_local_map);
10985  }
10986 
10987  if (col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
10988  {
10989  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(col_indices),
10990  col_index_global_to_local_map);
10991  }
10992 
10993  this->add(b,
10994  B,
10995  row_index_global_to_local_map,
10996  col_index_global_to_local_map,
10997  fixed_rank_k);
10998 }
10999 
11000 
11001 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11002 void
11003 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &C,
11004  const RkMatrix<Number> & B,
11005  const size_type fixed_rank_k)
11006 {
11007  C = (*this);
11008  C.add(B, fixed_rank_k);
11009 }
11010 
11011 
11012 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11013 void
11014 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &C,
11015  const Number b,
11016  const RkMatrix<Number> & B,
11017  const size_type fixed_rank_k)
11018 {
11019  C = (*this);
11020  C.add(b, B, fixed_rank_k);
11021 }
