11023 
11024 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11025 void
11026 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::invert_by_gauss_elim(
11027  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M_inv,
11028  const size_type fixed_rank_k)
11029 {
11030  _invert_by_gauss_elim(M_inv, fixed_rank_k);
11031 
11035  build_leaf_set();
11036  M_inv.build_leaf_set();
11037 }
11038 
11039 
11040 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11041 void
11042 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_forward_substitution(
11043  Vector<Number> &b,
11044  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
11045 {
11049  AssertDimension(m, n);
11050 
11051  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
11052  {
11057  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11058  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
11059 
11060  Vector<Number> local_b(n);
11061 
11065  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
11066  {
11067  local_b(j) = b(col_indices->at(j));
11068  }
11069 
11075  fullmatrix->solve_by_forward_substitution(local_b,
11076  false,
11077  is_unit_diagonal,
11078  true);
11079 
11083  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
11084  {
11085  b(row_indices->at(i)) = local_b(i);
11086  }
11087  }
11088  else
11089  {
11093  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
11094  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
11095  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
11096  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
11097 
11098  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
11099 
11100  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
11101  {
11106  for (size_type j = 0; j < i; j++)
11107  {
11108  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->vmult(b, -1.0, b);
11109  }
11110 
11114  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]->solve_by_forward_substitution(
11115  b, is_unit_diagonal);
11116  }
11117  }
11118 }
11119 
11120 
11121 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11122 void
11123 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_forward_substitution(
11124  Vector<Number> & x,
11125  const Vector<Number> &b,
11126  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
11127 {
11128  x = b;
11129  solve_by_forward_substitution(x, is_unit_diagonal);
11130 }
11131 
11132 
11133 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11134 void
11135 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_forward_substitution(
11136  Vector<Number> &b,
11137  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
11138  & vector_index_global_to_local_map,
11139  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
11140 {
11144  AssertDimension(m, n);
11145 
11146  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
11147  {
11152  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11153  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
11154 
11155  Vector<Number> local_b(n);
11156 
11160  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
11161  {
11162  local_b(j) =
11163  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j)));
11164  }
11165 
11171  fullmatrix->solve_by_forward_substitution(local_b,
11172  false,
11173  is_unit_diagonal,
11174  true);
11175 
11179  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
11180  {
11181  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i))) =
11182  local_b(i);
11183  }
11184  }
11185  else
11186  {
11190  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
11191  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
11192  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
11193  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
11194 
11195  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
11196 
11197  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
11198  {
11203  for (size_type j = 0; j < i; j++)
11204  {
11205  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->vmult(
11206  b,
11207  vector_index_global_to_local_map,
11208  -1.0,
11209  b,
11210  vector_index_global_to_local_map);
11211  }
11212 
11216  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]->solve_by_forward_substitution(
11217  b, vector_index_global_to_local_map, is_unit_diagonal);
11218  }
11219  }
11220 }
11221 
11222 
11223 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11224 void
11225 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_forward_substitution(
11226  Vector<Number> & x,
11227  const Vector<Number> &b,
11228  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
11229  & vector_index_global_to_local_map,
11230  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
11231 {
11232  x = b;
11233  solve_by_forward_substitution(x,
11234  vector_index_global_to_local_map,
11235  is_unit_diagonal);
11236 }
11237 
11238 
11239 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11240 void
11241 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
11242  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &X,
11243  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &Z,
11244  const unsigned int fixed_rank,
11245  const bool is_unit_diagonal)
11246 {
11247  AssertDimension(Z.m, X.m);
11248  AssertDimension(Z.n, X.n);
11249  Assert(
11250  Z.type == X.type,
11251  ExcMessage(
11252  "Matrix Z and X should be built a same block cluster and thus have a same H-matrix type!"));
11253  AssertDimension(this->m, this->n);
11254  AssertDimension(this->n, X.m);
11255 
11256  if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
11257  {
11258  if (this->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11259  {
11260  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
11261  *(this->col_indices), this->col_index_global_to_local_map);
11262  }
11263 
11268  Vector<Number> X_col(X.m);
11269  Vector<Number> Z_col(Z.m);
11270 
11274  for (size_type j = 0; j < Z.n; j++)
11275  {
11276  Z.fullmatrix->get_column(j, Z_col);
11277 
11283  this->solve_by_forward_substitution(
11284  X_col,
11285  Z_col,
11286  this->col_index_global_to_local_map,
11287  is_unit_diagonal);
11288 
11293  X.fullmatrix->fill_col(j, X_col);
11294  }
11295  }
11296  else if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
11297  {
11298  if (this->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11299  {
11300  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
11301  *(this->col_indices), this->col_index_global_to_local_map);
11302  }
11303 
11321  (*X.rkmatrix) = (*Z.rkmatrix);
11322 
11323  Vector<Number> A_prime_col(X.m);
11324  for (size_type j = 0; j < Z.rkmatrix->get_formal_rank(); j++)
11325  {
11326  Z.rkmatrix->get_A().get_column(j, A_prime_col);
11327 
11328  this->solve_by_forward_substitution(
11329  A_prime_col, this->col_index_global_to_local_map, is_unit_diagonal);
11330 
11334  X.rkmatrix->get_A().fill_col(j, A_prime_col);
11335  }
11336  }
11337  else
11338  {
11349  AssertDimension(
11350  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num(),
11351  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
11352 
11358  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
11359  X.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
11360  AssertDimension(
11361  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num(),
11362  n_row_blocks);
11367  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
11368  X.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
11369 
11374  AssertDimension(
11375  n_row_blocks,
11376  Z.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num());
11377  AssertDimension(
11378  n_col_blocks,
11379  Z.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
11380 
11384  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
11385  {
11391  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
11392  {
11397  for (size_type k = 0; k < i; k++)
11398  {
11399  this->submatrices[i * n_row_blocks + k]
11400  ->mmult_level_conserving(
11401  *(Z.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
11402  -1.0,
11403  *(X.submatrices[k * n_col_blocks + j]),
11404  fixed_rank);
11405  }
11406 
11411  this->submatrices[i * n_row_blocks + i]
11412  ->solve_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
11413  *(X.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
11414  *(Z.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
11415  fixed_rank,
11416  is_unit_diagonal);
11417  }
11418  }
11419  }
11420 }
11421 
11422 
11423 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11424 void
11425 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
11426  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &X,
11427  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &Z,
11428  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
11429 {
11430  solve_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(X, Z, fixed_rank, false);
11431 }
11432 
11433 
11434 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11435 void
11436 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11437  Vector<Number> &b) const
11438 {
11442  AssertDimension(m, n);
11443 
11444  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
11445  {
11451  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11452  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
11453 
11454  Vector<Number> local_b(m);
11455 
11459  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
11460  {
11461  local_b(i) = b(row_indices->at(i));
11462  }
11463 
11468  fullmatrix->solve_by_forward_substitution(local_b, true, false, false);
11469 
11473  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
11474  {
11475  b(col_indices->at(j)) = local_b(j);
11476  }
11477  }
11478  else
11479  {
11483  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
11484  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
11485  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
11486  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
11487 
11488  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
11489 
11493  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
11494  {
11499  for (size_type i = 0; i < j; i++)
11500  {
11501  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->Tvmult(b, -1.0, b);
11502  }
11503 
11507  submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
11508  ->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(b);
11509  }
11510  }
11511 }
11512 
11513 
11514 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11515 void
11516 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11517  Vector<Number> & x,
11518  const Vector<Number> &b) const
11519 {
11520  x = b;
11521  solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(x);
11522 }
11523 
11524 
11525 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11526 void
11527 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11528  Vector<Number> &b,
11529  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
11530  &vector_index_global_to_local_map) const
11531 {
11535  AssertDimension(m, n);
11536 
11537  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
11538  {
11544  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11545  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
11546 
11547  Vector<Number> local_b(m);
11548 
11552  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
11553  {
11554  local_b(i) =
11555  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i)));
11556  }
11557 
11562  fullmatrix->solve_by_forward_substitution(local_b, true, false, false);
11563 
11567  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
11568  {
11569  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j))) =
11570  local_b(j);
11571  }
11572  }
11573  else
11574  {
11578  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
11579  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
11580  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
11581  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
11582 
11583  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
11584 
11588  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
11589  {
11594  for (size_type i = 0; i < j; i++)
11595  {
11596  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->Tvmult(
11597  b,
11598  vector_index_global_to_local_map,
11599  -1.0,
11600  b,
11601  vector_index_global_to_local_map);
11602  }
11603 
11607  submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
11608  ->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11609  b, vector_index_global_to_local_map);
11610  }
11611  }
11612 }
11613 
11614 
11615 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11616 void
11617 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11618  Vector<Number> & x,
11619  const Vector<Number> &b,
11620  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
11621  &vector_index_global_to_local_map) const
11622 {
11623  x = b;
11624  solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(x, vector_index_global_to_local_map);
11625 }
11626 
11627 
11628 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11629 void
11630 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::
11631  solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
11632  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &X,
11633  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &Z,
11634  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
11635 {
11636  AssertDimension(Z.m, X.m);
11637  AssertDimension(Z.n, X.n);
11638  Assert(
11639  Z.type == X.type,
11640  ExcMessage(
11641  "Matrix Z and X should be built a same block cluster and thus have a same H-matrix type!"));
11642  AssertDimension(this->m, this->n);
11643  AssertDimension(X.n, this->m);
11644 
11645  if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
11646  {
11647  if (this->row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11648  {
11649  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
11650  *(this->row_indices), this->row_index_global_to_local_map);
11651  }
11652 
11657  Vector<Number> X_row(X.n);
11658  Vector<Number> Z_row(Z.n);
11659 
11663  for (size_type i = 0; i < Z.m; i++)
11664  {
11665  Z.fullmatrix->get_row(i, Z_row);
11666 
11672  this->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11673  X_row, Z_row, this->row_index_global_to_local_map);
11674 
11679  X.fullmatrix->fill_row(i, X_row);
11680  }
11681  }
11682  else if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
11683  {
11684  if (this->row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11685  {
11686  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
11687  *(this->row_indices), this->row_index_global_to_local_map);
11688  }
11689 
11690  (*X.rkmatrix) = (*Z.rkmatrix);
11691 
11692  Vector<Number> B_prime_col(X.n);
11693  for (size_type j = 0; j < Z.rkmatrix->get_formal_rank(); j++)
11694  {
11695  Z.rkmatrix->get_B().get_column(j, B_prime_col);
11696 
11701  this->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11702  B_prime_col, this->row_index_global_to_local_map);
11703 
11707  X.rkmatrix->get_B().fill_col(j, B_prime_col);
11708  }
11709  }
11710  else
11711  {
11722  AssertDimension(
11723  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num(),
11724  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
11725 
11730  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
11731  X.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
11737  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
11738  X.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
11739  AssertDimension(
11740  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num(),
11741  n_col_blocks);
11742 
11747  AssertDimension(
11748  n_row_blocks,
11749  Z.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num());
11750  AssertDimension(
11751  n_col_blocks,
11752  Z.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
11753 
11757  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
11758  {
11764  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
11765  {
11770  for (size_type k = 0; k < j; k++)
11771  {
11772  X.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + k]->mmult_level_conserving(
11773  *(Z.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
11774  -1.0,
11775  *(this->submatrices[k * n_col_blocks + j]),
11776  fixed_rank);
11777  }
11778 
11783  this->submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
11784  ->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
11785  *(X.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
11786  *(Z.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
11787  fixed_rank);
11788  }
11789  }
11790  }
11791 }
11792 
11793 
11794 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11795 void
11796 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::
11797  solve_cholesky_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
11798  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &X,
11799  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &Z,
11800  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
11801 {
11802  AssertDimension(Z.m, X.m);
11803  AssertDimension(Z.n, X.n);
11804  Assert(
11805  Z.type == X.type,
11806  ExcMessage(
11807  "Matrix Z and X should be built a same block cluster and thus have a same H-matrix type!"));
11808  AssertDimension(this->m, this->n);
11814  AssertDimension(X.n, this->n);
11815 
11816  if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
11817  {
11818  if (this->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11819  {
11820  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
11821  *(this->col_indices), this->col_index_global_to_local_map);
11822  }
11823 
11828  Vector<Number> X_row(X.n);
11829  Vector<Number> Z_row(Z.n);
11830 
11834  for (size_type i = 0; i < Z.m; i++)
11835  {
11836  Z.fullmatrix->get_row(i, Z_row);
11837 
11844  this->solve_by_forward_substitution(
11845  X_row, Z_row, this->col_index_global_to_local_map, false);
11846 
11851  X.fullmatrix->fill_row(i, X_row);
11852  }
11853  }
11854  else if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
11855  {
11856  if (this->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11857  {
11858  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
11859  *(this->col_indices), this->col_index_global_to_local_map);
11860  }
11861 
11862  (*X.rkmatrix) = (*Z.rkmatrix);
11863 
11864  Vector<Number> B_prime_col(X.n);
11865  for (size_type j = 0; j < Z.rkmatrix->get_formal_rank(); j++)
11866  {
11867  Z.rkmatrix->get_B().get_column(j, B_prime_col);
11868 
11874  this->solve_by_forward_substitution(
11875  B_prime_col, this->col_index_global_to_local_map, false);
11876 
11880  X.rkmatrix->get_B().fill_col(j, B_prime_col);
11881  }
11882  }
11883  else
11884  {
11895  AssertDimension(
11896  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num(),
11897  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
11898 
11903  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
11904  X.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
11910  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
11911  X.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
11912  AssertDimension(
11913  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num(),
11914  n_col_blocks);
11915 
11920  AssertDimension(
11921  n_row_blocks,
11922  Z.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num());
11923  AssertDimension(
11924  n_col_blocks,
11925  Z.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
11926 
11930  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
11931  {
11937  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
11938  {
11943  for (size_type k = 0; k < j; k++)
11944  {
11945  X.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + k]->mTmult_level_conserving(
11946  *(Z.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
11947  -1.0,
11948  *(this->submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + k]),
11949  fixed_rank);
11950  }
11951 
11956  this->submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
11957  ->solve_cholesky_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
11958  *(X.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
11959  *(Z.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
11960  fixed_rank);
11961  }
11962  }
11963  }
11964 }
11965 
11966 
11967 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11968 void
11969 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_block_triangular_by_forward_substitution(
11970  Vector<Number> &b,
11971  const bool is_unit_block_diagonal) const
11972 {
11976  AssertDimension(m, n);
11977 
11978  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
11979  {
11984  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11985  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
11986 
11987  if (is_unit_block_diagonal)
11988  {
11994  }
11995  else
11996  {
12002  Vector<Number> local_b(n);
12003 
12008  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
12009  {
12010  local_b(j) = b(col_indices->at(j));
12011  }
12012 
12016  fullmatrix->compute_lu_factorization();
12017  fullmatrix->solve(local_b);
12018 
12023  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
12024  {
12025  b(row_indices->at(i)) = local_b(i);
12026  }
12027  }
12028  }
12029  else
12030  {
12034  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12035  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12036  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12037  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12038 
12039  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12040 
12041  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12042  {
12047  for (size_type j = 0; j < i; j++)
12048  {
12049  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->vmult(b, -1.0, b);
12050  }
12051 
12055  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]
12056  ->solve_block_triangular_by_forward_substitution(
12057  b, is_unit_block_diagonal);
12058  }
12059  }
12060 }
12061 
12062 
12063 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12064 void
12065 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_block_triangular_by_forward_substitution(
12066  Vector<Number> & x,
12067  const Vector<Number> &b,
12068  const bool is_unit_block_diagonal) const
12069 {
12070  x = b;
12071  solve_block_triangular_by_forward_substitution(x, is_unit_block_diagonal);
12072 }
12073 
12074 
12075 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12076 void
12077 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution(
12078  Vector<Number> &b) const
12079 {
12080  solve_by_forward_substitution(b, false);
12081 }

12083 
12084 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12085 void
12086 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution(
12087  Vector<Number> & x,
12088  const Vector<Number> &b) const
12089 {
12090  solve_by_forward_substitution(x, b, false);
12091 }

12094 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12095 void
12096 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution(
12097  Vector<Number> &b,
12098  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
12099  &vector_index_global_to_local_map) const
12100 {
12101  solve_by_forward_substitution(b, vector_index_global_to_local_map, false);
12102 }

12104 
12105 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12106 void
12107 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution(
12108  Vector<Number> & x,
12109  const Vector<Number> &b,
12110  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
12111  &vector_index_global_to_local_map) const
12112 {
12113  solve_by_forward_substitution(x, b, vector_index_global_to_local_map, false);
12114 }
12115 
12116 
12117 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12118 void
12119 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_backward_substitution(
12120  Vector<Number> &b,
12121  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
12122 {
12126  AssertDimension(m, n);
12127 
12128  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12129  {
12134  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12135  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12136 
12137  Vector<Number> local_b(n);
12138 
12142  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
12143  {
12144  local_b(j) = b(col_indices->at(j));
12145  }
12146 
12150  fullmatrix->solve_by_backward_substitution(local_b,
12151  false,
12152  is_unit_diagonal);
12153 
12157  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
12158  {
12159  b(row_indices->at(i)) = local_b(i);
12160  }
12161  }
12162  else
12163  {
12167  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12168  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12169  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12170  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12171 
12172  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12173 
12174  for (int i = n_row_blocks - 1; i >= 0; i--)
12175  {
12180  for (size_type j = i + 1; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
12181  {
12182  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->vmult(b, -1.0, b);
12183  }
12184 
12188  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]->solve_by_backward_substitution(
12189  b, is_unit_diagonal);
12190  }
12191  }
12192 }
12193 
12194 
12195 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12196 void
12197 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_backward_substitution(
12198  Vector<Number> & x,
12199  const Vector<Number> &b,
12200  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
12201 {
12202  x = b;
12203  solve_by_backward_substitution(x, is_unit_diagonal);
12204 }
12205 
12206 
12207 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12208 void
12209 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_backward_substitution(
12210  Vector<Number> &b,
12211  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
12212  & vector_index_global_to_local_map,
12213  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
12214 {
12218  AssertDimension(m, n);
12219 
12220  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12221  {
12226  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12227  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12228 
12229  Vector<Number> local_b(n);
12230 
12234  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
12235  {
12236  local_b(j) =
12237  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j)));
12238  }
12239 
12243  fullmatrix->solve_by_backward_substitution(local_b,
12244  false,
12245  is_unit_diagonal);
12246 
12250  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
12251  {
12252  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i))) =
12253  local_b(i);
12254  }
12255  }
12256  else
12257  {
12261  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12262  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12263  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12264  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12265 
12266  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12267 
12268  for (int i = n_row_blocks - 1; i >= 0; i--)
12269  {
12274  for (size_type j = i + 1; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
12275  {
12276  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->vmult(
12277  b,
12278  vector_index_global_to_local_map,
12279  -1.0,
12280  b,
12281  vector_index_global_to_local_map);
12282  }
12283 
12287  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]->solve_by_backward_substitution(
12288  b, vector_index_global_to_local_map, is_unit_diagonal);
12289  }
12290  }
12291 }
12292 
12293 
12294 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12295 void
12296 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_backward_substitution(
12297  Vector<Number> & x,
12298  const Vector<Number> &b,
12299  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
12300  & vector_index_global_to_local_map,
12301  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
12302 {
12303  x = b;
12304  solve_by_backward_substitution(x,
12305  vector_index_global_to_local_map,
12306  is_unit_diagonal);
12307 }
12308 
12309 
12310 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12311 void
12312 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_block_triangular_by_backward_substitution(
12313  Vector<Number> &b,
12314  const bool is_unit_block_diagonal) const
12315 {
12319  AssertDimension(m, n);
12320 
12321  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12322  {
12327  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12328  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12329 
12330  if (is_unit_block_diagonal)
12331  {
12337  }
12338  else
12339  {
12345  Vector<Number> local_b(n);
12346 
12351  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
12352  {
12353  local_b(j) = b(col_indices->at(j));
12354  }
12355 
12359  fullmatrix->compute_lu_factorization();
12360  fullmatrix->solve(local_b);
12361 
12366  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
12367  {
12368  b(row_indices->at(i)) = local_b(i);
12369  }
12370  }
12371  }
12372  else
12373  {
12377  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12378  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12379  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12380  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12381 
12382  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12383 
12384  for (int i = n_row_blocks - 1; i >= 0; i--)
12385  {
12390  for (size_type j = i + 1; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
12391  {
12392  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->vmult(b, -1.0, b);
12393  }
12394 
12398  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]
12399  ->solve_block_triangular_by_backward_substitution(
12400  b, is_unit_block_diagonal);
12401  }
12402  }
12403 }
12404 
12405 
12406 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12407 void
12408 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_block_triangular_by_backward_substitution(
12409  Vector<Number> & x,
12410  const Vector<Number> &b,
12411  const bool is_unit_block_diagonal) const
12412 {
12413  x = b;
12414  solve_block_triangular_by_backward_substitution(x, is_unit_block_diagonal);
12415 }
12416 
12417 
12418 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12419 void
12420 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(
12421  Vector<Number> &b) const
12422 {
12426  AssertDimension(m, n);
12427 
12428  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12429  {
12434  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12435  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12436 
12437  Vector<Number> local_b(m);
12438 
12444  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
12445  {
12446  local_b(i) = b(row_indices->at(i));
12447  }
12448 
12453  fullmatrix->solve_by_backward_substitution(local_b, true, false);
12454 
12458  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
12459  {
12460  b(col_indices->at(j)) = local_b(j);
12461  }
12462  }
12463  else
12464  {
12465  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12466  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12467  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12468  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12469 
12470  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12471 
12475  for (int j = n_col_blocks - 1; j >= 0; j--)
12476  {
12481  for (size_type i = j + 1; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12482  {
12487  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->Tvmult(b, -1.0, b);
12488  }
12489 
12493  submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
12494  ->solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(b);
12495  }
12496  }
12497 }
12498 
12499 
12500 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12501 void
12502 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(
12503  Vector<Number> & x,
12504  const Vector<Number> &b) const
12505 {
12506  x = b;
12507  solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(x);
12508 }
12509 
12510 
12511 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12512 void
12513 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(
12514  Vector<Number> &b,
12515  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
12516  &vector_index_global_to_local_map) const
12517 {
12521  AssertDimension(m, n);
12522 
12523  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12524  {
12529  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12530  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12531 
12532  Vector<Number> local_b(m);
12533 
12539  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
12540  {
12541  local_b(i) =
12542  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i)));
12543  }
12544 
12549  fullmatrix->solve_by_backward_substitution(local_b, true, false);
12550 
12554  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
12555  {
12556  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j))) =
12557  local_b(j);
12558  }
12559  }
12560  else
12561  {
12562  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12563  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12564  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12565  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12566 
12567  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12568 
12572  for (int j = n_col_blocks - 1; j >= 0; j--)
12573  {
12578  for (size_type i = j + 1; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12579  {
12584  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->Tvmult(
12585  b,
12586  vector_index_global_to_local_map,
12587  -1.0,
12588  b,
12589  vector_index_global_to_local_map);
12590  }
12591 
12595  submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
12596  ->solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(
12597  b, vector_index_global_to_local_map);
12598  }
12599  }
12600 }
12601 
12602 
12603 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12604 void
12605 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(
12606  Vector<Number> & x,
12607  const Vector<Number> &b,
12608  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
12609  &vector_index_global_to_local_map) const
12610 {
12611  x = b;
12612  solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(x, vector_index_global_to_local_map);
12613 }
12614 
12615 
12616 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12617 void
12618 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::compute_lu_factorization(
12619  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &LU,
12620  const unsigned int fixed_rank) const
12621 {
12622  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12623  {
12632  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12633  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12634  Assert(LU.fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12635 
12639  *(LU.fullmatrix) = *fullmatrix;
12640 
12645  LU.fullmatrix->compute_lu_factorization();
12646  }
12647  else
12648  {
12649  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12650  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12651  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12652  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12653 
12658  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12659 
12664  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12665  {
12669  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
12670  {
12677  const size_type min_ij = std::min(i, j);
12681  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(*(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]));
12682  for (size_type k = 0; k < min_ij; k++)
12683  {
12684  LU.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + k]->mmult_level_conserving(
12685  Z,
12686  -1.0,
12687  *(LU.submatrices[k * n_col_blocks + j]),
12688  fixed_rank);
12689  }
12690 
12691  if (j < i)
12692  {
12699  LU.submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
12700  ->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
12701  *(LU.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]), Z, fixed_rank);
12702  }
12703  else if (j == i)
12704  {
12709  Z.compute_lu_factorization(
12710  *(LU.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]), fixed_rank);
12711  }
12712  else if (j > i)
12713  {
12717  LU.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]
12718  ->solve_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
12719  *(LU.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]), Z, fixed_rank);
12720  }
12721  }
12722  }
12723  }
12724 }
12725 
12726 
12727 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12728 void
12729 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::compute_lu_factorization(
12730  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
12731 {
12732  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12733  {
12742  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12743  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12744 
12749  fullmatrix->compute_lu_factorization();
12750  }
12751  else
12752  {
12753  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12754  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12755  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12756  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12757 
12762  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12763 
12768  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12769  {
12773  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
12774  {
12781  const size_type min_ij = std::min(i, j);
12785  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(*(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]));
12786  for (size_type k = 0; k < min_ij; k++)
12787  {
12788  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + k]->mmult_level_conserving(
12789  Z, -1.0, *(submatrices[k * n_col_blocks + j]), fixed_rank);
12790  }
12791 
12792  if (j < i)
12793  {
12800  submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
12801  ->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
12802  *(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]), Z, fixed_rank);
12803  }
12804  else if (j == i)
12805  {
12810  Z.compute_lu_factorization(
12811  *(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]), fixed_rank);
12812  }
12813  else if (j > i)
12814  {
12818  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]
12819  ->solve_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
12820  *(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]), Z, fixed_rank);
12821  }
12822  }
12823  }
12824  }
12825 }
12826 
12827 
12828 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12829 void
12830 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::compute_cholesky_factorization(
12831  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &L,
12832  const unsigned int fixed_rank) const
12833 {
12834  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12835  {
12844  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12845  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12846  Assert(L.fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12847 
12851  *(L.fullmatrix) = *fullmatrix;
12852 
12857  L.fullmatrix->compute_cholesky_factorization();
12858  }
12859  else
12860  {
12861  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12862  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12863  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12864  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12865 
12870  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12871 
12876  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12877  {
12882  for (size_type j = 0; j <= i; j++)
12883  {
12887  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(*(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]));
12888 
12892  for (size_type k = 0; k < j; k++)
12893  {
12894  L.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + k]->mTmult_level_conserving(
12895  Z,
12896  -1.0,
12897  *(L.submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + k]),
12898  fixed_rank);
12899  }
12900 
12901  if (j < i)
12902  {
12908  L.submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
12909  ->solve_cholesky_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
12910  *(L.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]), Z, fixed_rank);
12911  }
12912  else if (j == i)
12913  {
12918  Z.compute_cholesky_factorization(
12919  *(L.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]), fixed_rank);
12920  }
12921  else
12922  {
12923  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
12924  }
12925  }
12926  }
12927  }
12928 }
12929 
12930 
12931 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12932 void
12933 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::compute_cholesky_factorization(
12934  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
12935 {
12936  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12937  {
12946  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12947  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12948 
12953  fullmatrix->compute_cholesky_factorization();
12954  }
12955  else
12956  {
12957  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12958  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12959  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12960  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12961 
12966  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12967 
12972  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12973  {
12978  for (size_type j = 0; j <= i; j++)
12979  {
12983  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(*(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]));
12984 
12988  for (size_type k = 0; k < j; k++)
12989  {
12990  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + k]->mTmult_level_conserving(
12991  Z, -1.0, *(submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + k]), fixed_rank);
12992  }
12993 
12994  if (j < i)
12995  {
13001  submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
13002  ->solve_cholesky_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
13003  *(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]), Z, fixed_rank);
13004  }
13005  else if (j == i)
13006  {
13011  Z.compute_cholesky_factorization(
13012  *(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]), fixed_rank);
13013  }
13014  else
13015  {
13016  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
13017  }
13018  }
13019  }
13020  }
13021 }
13022 
13023 
13024 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13025 void
13026 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_lu(Vector<Number> & x,
13027  const Vector<Number> &b) const
13028 {
13029  x = b;
13030  solve_by_forward_substitution(x, true);
13031  solve_by_backward_substitution(x, false);
13032 }
13033 
13034 
13035 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13036 void
13037 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky(Vector<Number> & x,
13038  const Vector<Number> &b) const
13039 {
13040  x = b;
13041  solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution(x);
13042  solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(x);
13043 }
13044 
13045 
13046 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13047 void
13048 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::_invert_by_gauss_elim(
13049  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M_inv,
13050  const size_type fixed_rank_k)
13051 {
13052  AssertDimension(m, n);
13053 
13065  if (*(bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()) ==
13066  *(bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()) &&
13067  bc_node->is_leaf())
13068  {
13069  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
13070 
13071  this->fullmatrix->invert_by_gauss_elim(*(M_inv.fullmatrix));
13072  }
13073  else
13074  {
13075  AssertDimension(
13076  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num(),
13077  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
13078 
13083  const size_type k =
13084  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
13085 
13089  for (size_type l = 0; l < k; l++)
13090  {
13115  const size_type diag_block_index_in_submatrices = l + l * k;
13116  submatrices[diag_block_index_in_submatrices]->_invert_by_gauss_elim(
13117  *(M_inv.submatrices[diag_block_index_in_submatrices]),
13118  fixed_rank_k);
13119 
13128  for (size_type j = l + 1; j < k; j++)
13129  {
13130  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *C =
13131  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>(submatrices[j + l * k]->bc_node,
13132  fixed_rank_k);
13133  M_inv.submatrices[diag_block_index_in_submatrices]
13134  ->mmult_level_conserving(*C,
13135  *(submatrices[j + l * k]),
13136  fixed_rank_k);
13137 
13141  *(submatrices[j + l * k]) = std::move(*C);
13142 
13143  delete C;
13144  }
13145 
13151  for (size_type j = 0; j < l; j++)
13152  {
13153  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *C = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>(
13154  M_inv.submatrices[j + l * k]->bc_node, fixed_rank_k);
13155  M_inv.submatrices[diag_block_index_in_submatrices]
13156  ->mmult_level_conserving(*C,
13157  *(M_inv.submatrices[j + l * k]),
13158  fixed_rank_k);
13159 
13163  *(M_inv.submatrices[j + l * k]) = std::move(*C);
13164 
13165  delete C;
13166  }
13167 
13172  for (size_type i = l + 1; i < k; i++)
13173  {
13174  for (size_type j = 0; j <= l; j++)
13175  {
13176  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *C = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>(
13177  M_inv.submatrices[j + i * k]->bc_node, fixed_rank_k);
13178  submatrices[l + i * k]->mmult_level_conserving(
13179  *C, *(M_inv.submatrices[j + l * k]), fixed_rank_k);
13180  M_inv.submatrices[j + i * k]->add(-1.0, *C, fixed_rank_k);
13181 
13182  delete C;
13183  }
13184 
13185  for (size_type j = l + 1; j < k; j++)
13186  {
13187  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *C = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>(
13188  submatrices[j + i * k]->bc_node, fixed_rank_k);
13189  submatrices[l + i * k]->mmult_level_conserving(
13190  *C, *(submatrices[j + l * k]), fixed_rank_k);
13191  submatrices[j + i * k]->add(-1.0, *C, fixed_rank_k);
13192 
13193  delete C;
13194  }
13195  }
13196  }
13197 
13201  for (size_type l = k - 1; l > 0; l--)
13202  {
13206  size_type i = l - 1;
13207  while (true)
13208  {
13209  for (size_type j = 0; j < k; j++)
13210  {
13211  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *C = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>(
13212  M_inv.submatrices[j + i * k]->bc_node, fixed_rank_k);
13213  submatrices[l + i * k]->mmult_level_conserving(
13214  *C, *(M_inv.submatrices[j + l * k]), fixed_rank_k);
13215  M_inv.submatrices[j + i * k]->add(-1.0, *C, fixed_rank_k);
13216 
13217  delete C;
13218  }
13219 
13220  if (i == 0)
13221  {
13222  break;
13223  }
13224  else
13225  {
13226  i--;
13227  }
13228  }
13229  }
13230  }
13231 }
13232 
13233 
13234 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13235 void
13236 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::coarsen_to_subtree(
13237  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &subtree,
13238  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
13239 {
13240  coarsen_to_partition(subtree.get_leaf_set(), fixed_rank_k);
13241  build_leaf_set();
13242 }
13243 
13244 
13245 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13246 void
13247 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::coarsen_to_partition(
13248  const std::vector<
13249  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type> &partition,
13250  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
13251 {
13259  if (find_pointer_data(partition.begin(), partition.end(), this->bc_node) !=
13260  partition.end())
13261  {
13267  convertHMatBlockToRkMatrix(this, fixed_rank_k);
13268  }
13269  else
13270  {
13276  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
13277  {
13278  submatrix->coarsen_to_partition(partition, fixed_rank_k);
13279  }
13280  }
13281 }
13282 
13283 
13284 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13285 void
13286 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::build_leaf_set()
13287 {
13288  leaf_set.clear();
13289  _build_leaf_set(leaf_set);
13290 }
13291 
13292 
13293 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13294 std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *> &
13295 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_leaf_set()
13296 {
13297  return leaf_set;
13298 }
13299 
13300 
13301 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13302 const std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *> &
13303 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_leaf_set() const
13304 {
13305  return leaf_set;
13306 }
13307 
13308 
13309 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13310 typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>::iterator
13311 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::find_block_cluster_in_leaf_set(
13312  const BlockCluster<spacedim, Number> &block_cluster)
13313 {
13314  typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>::iterator iter;
13315  for (iter = leaf_set.begin(); iter != leaf_set.end(); iter++)
13316  {
13329  if ((*iter)->bc_node != nullptr)
13330  {
13331  if ((*iter)->bc_node->get_data_reference() == block_cluster)
13332  {
13333  break;
13334  }
13335  }
13336  }
13337 
13338  return iter;
13339 }
13340 
13341 
13342 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13343 typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>::const_iterator
13344 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::find_block_cluster_in_leaf_set(
13345  const BlockCluster<spacedim, Number> &block_cluster) const
13346 {
13347  for (typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>::const_iterator iter =
13348  leaf_set.cbegin();
13349  iter != leaf_set.cend();
13350  iter++)
13351  {
13364  if ((*iter)->bc_node != nullptr)
13365  {
13366  if ((*iter)->bc_node->get_data_reference() == block_cluster)
13367  {
13368  return iter;
13369  }
13370  }
13371  }
13372 }
13373 
13374 
13375 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13376 void
13377 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::refine_to_supertree()
13378 {
13388  for (HMatrix *hmat_leaf_node : leaf_set)
13389  {
13393  if (hmat_leaf_node->row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
13394  {
13395  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
13396  *(hmat_leaf_node->row_indices),
13397  hmat_leaf_node->row_index_global_to_local_map);
13398  }
13399 
13400  if (hmat_leaf_node->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
13401  {
13402  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
13403  *(hmat_leaf_node->col_indices),
13404  hmat_leaf_node->col_index_global_to_local_map);
13405  }
13406 
13407  RefineHMatrixWrtExtendedBlockClusterTree(hmat_leaf_node, hmat_leaf_node);
13408 
13413  if (hmat_leaf_node->submatrices.size() > 0)
13414  {
13422  switch (hmat_leaf_node->type)
13423  {
13424  case FullMatrixType:
13425  {
13426  delete hmat_leaf_node->fullmatrix;
13427  hmat_leaf_node->fullmatrix = nullptr;
13428 
13429  break;
13430  }
13431  case RkMatrixType:
13432  {
13433  delete hmat_leaf_node->rkmatrix;
13434  hmat_leaf_node->rkmatrix = nullptr;
13435 
13436  break;
13437  }
13438  default:
13439  {
13440  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(hmat_leaf_node->type));
13441 
13442  break;
13443  }
13444  }
13445 
13446  hmat_leaf_node->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
13447  }
13448  }
13449 
13455  build_leaf_set();
13456 
13461 }
13462 
13463 
13464 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13465 void
13466 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::convert_between_different_block_cluster_trees(
13467  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct1,
13468  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct2,
13469  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k2)
13470 {
13475  std::vector<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>
13476  target_leaf_set(bct2.get_leaf_set());
13477 
13485  if (bct1.extend_finer_than_partition(target_leaf_set))
13486  {
13487  this->refine_to_supertree();
13488  }
13489 
13495  bool is_bct2_extended = bct2.extend_to_finer_partition(bct1.get_leaf_set());
13496 
13514  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> hmat_new(bct2, std::move(*this));
13515 
13516  if (is_bct2_extended)
13517  {
13522  hmat_new.coarsen_to_partition(target_leaf_set, fixed_rank_k2);
13523  hmat_new.build_leaf_set();
13524 
13530  // std::ofstream out1("target_bct_with_extension.dat");
13531  // bct2.write_leaf_set(out1);
13532  // out1.close();
13533  // std::cout << "=== bct2 with extension ===\n";
13534  // std::cout << "Number of nodes: " << bct2.get_node_num()
13535  // << "\nDepth: " << bct2.get_depth()
13536  // << "\nMax level: " << bct2.get_max_level() <<
13537  // std::endl;
13538  bct2.prune_to_partition(target_leaf_set, true);
13539  // std::ofstream out2("target_bct_after_pruning.dat");
13540  // bct2.write_leaf_set(out2);
13541  // out2.close();
13542  // std::cout << "=== bct2 after pruning ===\n";
13543  // std::cout << "Number of nodes: " << bct2.get_node_num()
13544  // << "\nDepth: " << bct2.get_depth()
13545  // << "\nMax level: " << bct2.get_max_level() <<
13546  // std::endl;
13547  }
13548 
13553  (*this) = std::move(hmat_new);
13554 }
13555 
13556 
13557 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13558 void
13559 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::remove_hmat_pair_from_mm_product_list(
13560  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M1,
13561  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M2)
13562 {
13563  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
13564  current_hmat_pair(const_cast<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(M1),
13565  const_cast<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(M2));
13566 
13567  typename std::vector<std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *,
13568  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>>::iterator
13569  matched_hmat_pair_iter =
13570  std::find(Sigma_P.begin(), Sigma_P.end(), current_hmat_pair);
13571 
13572  if (matched_hmat_pair_iter != Sigma_P.end())
13573  {
13574  Sigma_P.erase(matched_hmat_pair_iter);
13575  }
13576 }
13577 
13578 
13579 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13580 void
13581 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::remove_hmat_pair_from_mm_product_list(
13582  const std::pair<const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *,
13583  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *> &hmat_pair)
13584 {
13585  typename std::vector<std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *,
13586  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>>::iterator
13587  matched_hmat_pair_iter =
13588  std::find(Sigma_P.begin(), Sigma_P.end(), hmat_pair);
13589 
13590  if (matched_hmat_pair_iter != Sigma_P.end())
13591  {
13592  Sigma_P.erase(matched_hmat_pair_iter);
13593  }
13594 }
13595 
13596 
13597 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13598 TreeNodeSplitMode
13599 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::determine_mm_split_mode_from_Sigma_P()
13600 {
13601  TreeNodeSplitMode initial_split_mode, current_split_mode;
13602 
13603  size_type counter = 0;
13604  for (const std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
13605  &hmat_pair : Sigma_P)
13606  {
13607  if ((hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == HorizontalSplitMode &&
13608  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == UnsplitMode) ||
13609  (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode &&
13610  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == HorizontalSplitMode))
13611  {
13612  current_split_mode = HorizontalSplitMode;
13613  }
13614  else if ((hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == UnsplitMode &&
13615  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
13616  VerticalSplitMode) ||
13617  (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
13618  VerticalSplitMode &&
13619  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode))
13620  {
13621  current_split_mode = VerticalSplitMode;
13622  }
13623  else if ((hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode &&
13624  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
13625  CrossSplitMode) ||
13626  (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
13627  HorizontalSplitMode &&
13628  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
13629  VerticalSplitMode))
13630  {
13631  current_split_mode = CrossSplitMode;
13632  }
13633  else
13634  {
13635  Assert(false,
13636  ExcMessage(
13637  "Inconsistent case met during H-matrix MM multiplication"));
13638  }
13639 
13640  if (counter == 0)
13641  {
13642  initial_split_mode = current_split_mode;
13643  }
13644  else if (current_split_mode != initial_split_mode)
13645  {
13646  Assert(false,
13647  ExcMessage(
13648  "Inconsistent case met during H-matrix MM multiplication"));
13649  }
13650 
13651  counter++;
13652  }
13653 
13654  return initial_split_mode;
13655 }
13656 
13657 #endif /* INCLUDE_HMATRIX_H_ */
